# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-104">Definities van entiteiten van het type Gevoelige informatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-105">Preventie van gegevensverlies (DLP) in het Compliancecentrum bevat veel typen gevoelige informatie die klaar zijn voor gebruik in uw DLP-beleid.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-106">In dit artikel worden al deze typen gevoelige informatie beschreven en wordt beschreven waar een DLP-beleid naar zoekt wanneer elk type wordt gedetecteerd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-107">Zie Gevoelige informatietypen voor meer informatie over [gevoelige informatietypen.](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-107">To learn more about sensitive information types, see [Sensitive information types](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-108">ABA-routeringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-109">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-110">negen cijfers met een opgemaakt of niet-opgemaakt patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-111">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-112">twee cijfers in het bereik 00-12, 21-32, 61-72 of 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-113">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-114">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-115">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-116">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-117">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-118">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-119">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-120">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-121">Een beleid heeft het medium vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-122">De functie Func_aba_routing inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-123">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ABA_Routing gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-124">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-125">De functie Func_aba_routing inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-143">ArgentiniÃ« national identity (DNI) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-144">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-145">Acht cijfers met of zonder perioden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-146">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-147">Acht cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-148">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-149">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-150">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-151">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-152">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-153">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-154">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-155">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-156">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-157">De normale expressie Regex_argentina_national_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-158">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_argentina_national_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-171">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-172">Elf cijfers met streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-172">Eleven digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-173">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-174">Elf cijfers met een streepje:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-174">Eleven digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-175">twee cijfers in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 of 34</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-176">een afbreekstreester (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-177">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-178">een afbreekstreester (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-179">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-180">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-181">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-182">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-183">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-184">Met de `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-185">Er wordt een `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-186">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-187">Met de `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-226">AustraliÃ« bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-227">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-228">zes tot tien cijfers met of zonder banknummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-228">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-229">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-230">Accountnummer is 6 tot 10 cijfers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-231">Nummer van de australische bankstaat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-232">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-233">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-233">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-234">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-235">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-236">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-237">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-238">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-239">De normale expressie Regex_australia_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-240">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_australia_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-241">De normale expressie Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-242">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-243">De normale expressie Regex_australia_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-244">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_australia_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="43275-332">negen letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-333">twee cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-334">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-335">vijf cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-336">OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-337">een tot twee optionele letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-338">vier tot negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-339">OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-340">negen cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-341">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-342">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-343">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-344">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-345">De normale expressie Regex_australia_drivers_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-346">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-347">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-447">Nummer van medische rekening australiÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-448">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-449">10-11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-450">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-451">10-11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-452">Het eerste cijfer is in het bereik 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-453">Negen cijfers is een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-453">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-454">Tiende cijfer is het probleemcijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-455">Het elfde cijfer (optioneel) is het afzonderlijke getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-456">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-457">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-458">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-459">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-460">Met de Func_australian_medical_account_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-461">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-462">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-474">AustraliÃ« paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-475">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-476">acht of negen alfanumerieke tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span> 

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-477">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-478">Ã©Ã©n letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X), gevolgd door 7 cijfers of</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by 7 digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-479">2 letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ), gevolgd door 7 cijfers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-479">2 letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by 7 digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-480">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-481">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-482">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-483">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-484">Met de normale `Regex_australia_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-485">Er wordt een `Keyword_australia_passport_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-486">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-487">Met de normale `Regex_australia_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>  
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-507">AustraliÃ« belastingbestandsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-508">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-509">acht tot negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-510">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-511">acht tot negen cijfers die gewoonlijk spaties als volgt worden weergegeven:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-512">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-512">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-513">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-513">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-514">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-514">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-515">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-515">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-516">twee tot drie cijfers waarbij het laatste cijfer een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-517">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-518">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-519">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-520">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-521">De functie Func_australian_tax_file_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-522">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number of Keyword_number_exclusions gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-523">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-535">Oostenrijks rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-536">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-537">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-538">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-539">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-539">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-540">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-541">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-541">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-542">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-543">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-544">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-545">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-672">Oostenrijk-identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-673">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-674">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-675">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-676">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-677">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-678">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-679">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-680">Een combinatie van 24 tekens van letters, cijfers en speciale tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-681">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-682">24 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-682">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="43275-683">22 letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig), cijfers, backslashes, slashes of plustekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-684">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig), cijfers, backslashes, slashes, plustekens of gelijktekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-685">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-686">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-686">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-687">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-688">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-689">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-690">Er wordt een  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-691">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-691">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-693">identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-693">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-694">nationale id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-694">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-695">personalausweis republik Ã¶sterreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-695">personalausweis republik Ã¶sterreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-696">Oostenrijks paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-697">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-698">EÃ©n letter gevolgd door een optionele spatie en zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-699">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-700">Een combinatie van Ã©Ã©n letter, zeven cijfers en Ã©Ã©n spatie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-701">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-702">Ã©Ã©n spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-703">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-703">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-704">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-705">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-705">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-706">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-707">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-708">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-709">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-710">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-711">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-712">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-713">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-737">Oostenrijks sociaal-zekerheidsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-738">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-739">10 cijfers in de opgegeven notatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-740">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-741">10 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-741">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-742">drie cijfers die overeenkomen met een serieel getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-743">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-744">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-745">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-746">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-747">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-748">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-749">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-750">een trefwoord  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` uit wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-751">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-752">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-778">Oostenrijks btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-779">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-780">negen cijfers met optioneel afbreekstreester en schuine streep</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-781">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-782">negen cijfers met optioneel afbreekstreester en schuine streep vooruit:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-783">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-784">een afbreekstreester (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-785">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-786">a forward slash (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-787">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-787">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-788">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-789">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-789">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-790">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-791">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-792">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-793">Er wordt een  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-794">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-795">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-818">Oostenrijks belasting over toegevoegde waarde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-819">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-820">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-821">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-822">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-823">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-824">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-825">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-826">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-827">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-828">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-829">A of een</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-829">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-830">T of t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-830">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-831">Optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-831">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-832">U of u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-832">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-833">optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-833">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-834">twee of drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-834">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-835">optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-835">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-836">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-836">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-837">optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-837">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-838">een of twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-838">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-839">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-840">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-840">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-841">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-842">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-843">Met de Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-844">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-845">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-846">Met de Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-864">Azure DocumentDB auth-toets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-865">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-866">De tekenreeks 'DocumentDb', gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-867">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-868">De tekenreeks 'DocumentDb'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-869">Een combinatie van 3-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-870">Een groter dan symbool (>), een gelijkteken (=), een aanhalingsteken ("), of een apostrof (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-871">Elke combinatie van 86 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, slash (/) of plusteken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-872">Twee gelijke tekens (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-873">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-874">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-875">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-876">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-877">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-878">In de CEP_CommonExampleKeywords wordt geen inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-885">sandbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-885">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-886">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-886">onebox</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-893">Azure IAAS-databaseverbindingsreeks en Azure SQL-verbindingsreeks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-893">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-894">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-894">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-895">De tekenreeks 'Server', 'server' of 'gegevensbron', gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven, inclusief de tekenreeks 'cloudapp.azure..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-895">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="43275-896">com' of 'cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-896">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="43275-897">net" of "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-897">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="43275-898">en de tekenreeks 'Wachtwoord' of 'wachtwoord' of 'pwd'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-898">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-899">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-899">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-900">de tekenreeks 'Server', 'server' of 'gegevensbron'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-900">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-901">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-902">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-903">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-904">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-904">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-905">De tekenreeks 'cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-905">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="43275-906">com', 'cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="43275-907">net", of "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-907">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="43275-908">netto"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-908">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-909">een combinatie van 1-300 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-909">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-910">de tekenreeks 'Wachtwoord', 'wachtwoord' of 'pwd'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-910">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-911">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-911">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-912">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-912">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-913">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-914">een of meer tekens die geen puntkomma (;), aanhalingsteken (") of apostrof (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-914">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-915">een puntkomma (;), aanhalingsteken (") of apostrof (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-915">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-916">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-917">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-918">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-919">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-919">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-920">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-920">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-921">In de CEP_CommonExampleKeywords wordt geen inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-921">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="43275-924">(Technisch gezien identificeert dit type gevoelige informatie deze trefwoorden met behulp van een gewone expressie, niet met een trefwoordlijst.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-924">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-925">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-925">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-926">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-926">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-927">noordenwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-927">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-928">sandbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-928">sandbox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-930">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-930">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-931">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-931">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-932">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-932">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="43275-933">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-933">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-934">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-934">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="43275-935">netto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-935">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-936">Azure IoT-verbindingsreeks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-936">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-937">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-938">De tekenreeks 'HostName' gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven, inclusief de tekenreeksen 'azure-devices'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-938">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="43275-939">net" en "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-939">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-940">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-940">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-941">de tekenreeks 'HostName'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-941">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-942">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-942">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-943">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-943">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-944">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-944">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-945">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-945">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-946">de tekenreeks 'azure-devices'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-946">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="43275-947">netto"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-947">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-948">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-948">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-949">de tekenreeks 'SharedAccessKey'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-949">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-950">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-950">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-951">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-951">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-952">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-952">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-953">een combinatie van 43 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, slash (/) of plusteken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-953">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-954">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-954">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-955">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-955">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-956">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-956">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-957">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-957">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-958">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-958">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-959">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-959">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-960">In de CEP_CommonExampleKeywords wordt geen inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-960">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-975">Wachtwoord voor publiceren in Azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-975">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-976">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-976">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-977">De tekenreeks 'userpwd=' gevolgd door een alfanumerieke tekenreeks.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-977">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-978">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-978">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-979">de tekenreeks 'userpwd='</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-979">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-980">een combinatie van 60 kleine letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-980">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-981">een aanhalingsteken (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-981">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-982">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-982">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-983">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-983">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-984">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-984">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-985">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-985">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-986">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-986">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-987">In de CEP_CommonExampleKeywords wordt geen inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-987">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
