### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1003">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1004">De tekenreeks 'redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1004">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="43275-1005">net" gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven, inclusief de tekenreeks 'wachtwoord' of 'pwd'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1005">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1006">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1006">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1007">de tekenreeks 'redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1007">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="43275-1008">netto"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1008">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1009">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1009">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1010">de tekenreeks 'wachtwoord' of 'pwd'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1010">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1011">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1011">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1012">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1012">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1013">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1013">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1014">een combinatie van 43 tekens die kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, slash (/) of plusteken (+) zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1014">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1015">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1015">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1016">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1016">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1017">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1017">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1018">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1018">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1019">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1019">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1020">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1020">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1021">In de CEP_CommonExampleKeywords wordt geen inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1021">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1036">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1036">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1037">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1038">De tekenreeks 'sig' gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1038">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1039">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1039">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1040">de tekenreeks 'sig'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1040">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1041">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1041">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1042">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1042">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1043">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1043">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1044">een combinatie van 43-53 tekens die kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers of het procentteken (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1044">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1045">de tekenreeks '%3d'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1045">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1046">een teken dat geen kleine of hoofdletter, cijfer of procentteken (%) is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1046">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1047">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1048">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1048">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1049">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1050">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1051">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_AzureSAS inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1051">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1052">Verbindingsreeks Azure-servicebus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1052">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1053">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1054">De tekenreeks 'Eindpunt', gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven, inclusief de tekenreeksen 'servicebus.windows'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1054">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="43275-1055">net" en "SharedAccesKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1055">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1056">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1056">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1057">de tekenreeks 'EndPoint'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1057">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1058">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1058">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1059">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1059">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1060">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1060">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1061">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1061">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1062">de tekenreeks 'servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1062">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="43275-1063">netto"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1063">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1064">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1064">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1065">de tekenreeks 'SharedAccessKey'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1065">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1066">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1066">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1067">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1067">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1068">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1068">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1069">een combinatie van 43 tekens die kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, slash (/) of plusteken (+) zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1069">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1070">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1070">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1071">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1071">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1072">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1072">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1073">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1073">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1074">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1074">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1075">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1075">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1076">In de CEP_CommonExampleKeywords wordt geen inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1076">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1097">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1097">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1098">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1098">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1099">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1099">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1100">de tekenreeks 'AccountKey'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1100">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1101">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1101">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1102">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1102">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1103">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1103">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1104">een combinatie van 86 tekens die kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, slash (/) of plusteken (+) zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1104">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1105">twee gelijke tekens (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1105">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1106">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1106">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1108">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1109">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1110">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1110">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1111">De normale expressie CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon, wordt niet gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1111">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1112">In de CEP_CommonExampleKeywords wordt geen inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1112">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1130">Azure Storage accountcode (generic)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1130">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1131">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1131">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1132">Elke combinatie van 86 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, de slash (/) of het plusteken (+), voorafgegaan of gevolgd door de tekens die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1132">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1133">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1133">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1134">nul tot een van de grootste symbolen (>), apostrof ('), gelijkteken (=), aanhalingsteken (") of getalteken (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1134">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1135">een combinatie van 86 tekens die kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, de slash (/) of het plusteken (+) zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1135">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1136">twee gelijke tekens (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1136">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1137">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1138">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1139">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1140">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1140">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1141">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1141">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1142">Nummer van het Rijbewijs van BelgiÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1142">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1143">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1144">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1144">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1145">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1146">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1146">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1147">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1148">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1148">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1149">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1150">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1150">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1151">Met de normale  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1151">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1152">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1152">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1285">Nationaal nummer belgiÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1285">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1286">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1287">11 cijfers plus optionele scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1287">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1288">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1289">11 cijfers plus scheidingstekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1289">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1290">zes cijfers en twee optionele perioden in de notatie YY. MM.DD voor geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1290">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1291">Een optioneel scheidingsteken van punt, streepje, spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1291">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1292">drie opeenvolgende cijfers (oneven voor mannen, zelfs voor vrouwen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1292">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1293">Een optioneel scheidingsteken van punt, streepje, spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1293">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1294">twee controlecijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1294">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1295">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1296">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1296">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1297">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1298">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1299">De functie Func_belgium_national_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1299">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1300">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_belgium_national_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1300">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1301">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1301">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1302">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1302">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1303">De functie Func_belgium_national_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1303">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1304">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1304">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1363">BelgiÃ« paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1363">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1364">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1365">twee letters gevolgd door zes cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1365">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1366">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1367">twee letters en gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1367">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1368">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1369">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1369">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1370">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1370">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="43275-1371">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1372">Met de normale  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1372">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1373">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1373">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1374">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date2` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YY of een trefwoord van of wordt `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1374">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1375">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1375">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1376">Met de normale  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1376">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1377">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1377">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1404">BelgiÃ« btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1404">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-1405">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1405">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1406">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1406">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1407">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1407">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1408">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1408">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1409">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1409">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1410">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1410">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1411">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1412">Alfanumeriek patroon van 12 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1412">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1413">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1414">Alfanumeriek patroon van 12 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1414">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1415">een letter B of b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1415">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1416">een letter E of e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1416">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1417">een cijfer 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1417">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1418">een cijfer van 1 tot en met 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1418">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1419">een optionele punt of afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1419">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1420">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1420">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1421">een optionele punt of afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1421">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1422">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1422">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1423">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1424">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1424">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1425">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1426">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1427">De functie Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1427">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1428">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1428">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1429">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1430">De functie Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1430">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1442">BraziliÃ« CPF-getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1442">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1443">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1444">11 cijfers die een controlecijfer bevatten en kunnen worden opgemaakt of niet-opgemaakt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1444">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1445">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1446">Opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1446">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1447">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1447">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1448">een punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1448">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1449">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1449">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1450">een punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1450">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1451">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1451">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1452">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1452">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1453">twee cijfers die cijfers controleren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1453">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1454">Niet-opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1454">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1455">11 cijfers waarbij de laatste twee cijfers controlecijfers zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1455">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1456">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1457">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1458">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1459">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1460">De functie Func_brazil_cpf inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1460">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1461">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_brazil_cpf gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1461">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1462">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1462">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1463">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1464">De functie Func_brazil_cpf inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1464">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1465">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1477">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1477">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1478">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1479">14 cijfers met een registratienummer, vertakkingsnummer en controlecijfers, plus scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1479">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1480">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1481">14 cijfers, plus scheidingstekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1481">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1482">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1482">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1483">een punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1483">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1484">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1484">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1485">een punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1485">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1486">drie cijfers (deze eerste acht cijfers zijn het registratienummer)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1486">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1487">een slash naar voren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1487">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1488">vertakkingsnummer met vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1488">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1489">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1489">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1490">twee cijfers die cijfers controleren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1490">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1491">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1492">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1492">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1493">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1494">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1494">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1495">Met de Func_brazil_cnpj wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1495">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1496">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_brazil_cnpj gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1496">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1497">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1497">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1498">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1498">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1499">Met de Func_brazil_cnpj wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1499">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1500">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1518">Pessoas jurÃ­dicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1518">Pessoas jurÃ­dicas</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1522">BraziliÃ« National Identification Card (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1522">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1523">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1524">Registro Geral (oude notatie): Negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1524">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nieuwe indeling): 11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1526">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1527">Registro Geral (oude indeling):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1527">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1528">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1528">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1529">een punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1529">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1530">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1530">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1531">een punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1531">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1532">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1532">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1533">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1533">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1534">een cijfer dat een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1534">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nieuwe indeling):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1536">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1536">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1537">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1537">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1538">een cijfer dat een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1538">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1539">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1540">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1540">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1541">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1542">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1542">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1543">Met de Func_brazil_rg wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1543">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1544">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_brazil_rg gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1544">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1545">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1545">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1549">identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1549">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1550">nationale id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1550">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1551">nÃºmero de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1551">nÃºmero de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1552">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1552">registro de Iidentidade</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1556">Bulgarije rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1556">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1557">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1558">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1558">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1559">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1560">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1560">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1561">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1562">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1563">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1564">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1565">Met de normale  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1565">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1566">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1693">Een uniform burgerlijk burgernummer van Bulgarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1693">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-1694">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1694">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1695">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1695">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1696">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1696">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1697">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1697">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1698">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1698">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1699">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1699">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1700">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1701">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1701">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1702">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1703">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1703">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1704">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1704">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1705">twee cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1705">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1706">Ã©Ã©n cijfer dat overeenkomt met geslacht: een even cijfer voor man en een oneven cijfer voor vrouw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1706">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1707">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1707">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1708">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1709">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1709">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1710">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1711">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1712">Met de  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1712">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1713">Er wordt een  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1713">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1714">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1714">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1715">Met de  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1715">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1760">Bulgarije paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1760">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1761">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1762">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1762">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1763">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1764">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1764">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1765">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1766">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1766">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1767">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1768">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1768">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1769">Met de normale  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1769">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1770">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1771">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1771">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1772">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1772">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1773">Met de normale  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1773">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1774">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1774">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1794">Canada bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1794">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1795">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1796">7 of 12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1796">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1797">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1798">Een Canada-bankrekeningnummer is 7 of 12 cijfers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1798">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1799">Een transitnummer van een Canadese bankrekening is:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1799">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1800">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1800">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1801">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1801">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1802">drie cijfers OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1802">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1803">een nul "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1803">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1804">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1804">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1805">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1806">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1807">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1808">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1808">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1809">De normale expressie Regex_canada_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1809">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1810">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_canada_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1810">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1811">De normale expressie Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1811">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1812">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1813">De normale expressie Regex_canada_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1813">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1814">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_canada_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1814">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1838">Canada-nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1838">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1839">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1839">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1840">Verschilt per provincie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1840">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1841">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1841">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1842">Verschillende patronen voor Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec en Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1842">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1843">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1844">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1844">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1845">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1846">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1847">De functie Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1847">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1848">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1848">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1985">Canada health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1985">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1986">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1986">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="43275-1987">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1987">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1988">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1988">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1989">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1989">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1990">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1991">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1991">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-1992">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-1993">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-1994">De normale expressie Regex_canada_health_service_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-1994">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2007">Canada-paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2007">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2008">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2008">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2009">twee hoofdletters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2009">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2010">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2010">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2011">twee hoofdletters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2011">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2012">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2012">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2015">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2015">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2016">De normale expressie Regex_canada_passport_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2016">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2017">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_canada_passport_number of Keyword_passport gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2017">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2047">Canada Personal Health Identification Number (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2047">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2048">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2048">Format</span></span>
