<span data-ttu-id="43275-2051">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2051">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2052">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2052">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2053">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2053">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2054">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2054">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2055">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2055">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2056">De normale expressie Regex_canada_phin inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2056">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2057">Er worden ten minste twee trefwoorden Keyword_canada_phin of Keyword_canada_provinces gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2057">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2090">Canada social insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2090">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2091">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2092">negen cijfers met optionele afbreekstree streepjes of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2092">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2093">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2094">Opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2094">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2095">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2095">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2096">een afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2096">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2097">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2097">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2098">een afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2098">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2099">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2099">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2100">Niet-opgemaakt: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2100">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2101">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2102">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2102">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2103">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2104">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2104">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2105">De functie Func_canadian_sin inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2105">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2106">Ten minste twee van de volgende combinaties:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2106">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-2107">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2107">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-2108">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_sin_collaborative gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2108">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-2109">Met de Func_eu_date wordt een datum in de juiste datumnotatie gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2109">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2110">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2110">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2111">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2111">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2112">De functie Func_unformatted_canadian_sin inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2112">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2113">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2113">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2114">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2114">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2139">Chili-identiteitskaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2139">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2140">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2141">zeven tot acht cijfers plus scheidingstekens van een vinkje of letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2141">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2142">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2143">zeven tot acht cijfers plus scheidingstekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2143">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2144">Ã©Ã©n tot twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2144">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2145">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2145">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2146">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2146">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2147">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2147">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2148">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2148">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2149">een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2149">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2150">een cijfer of letter (niet case-sensitive) dat is een controlecijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2150">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2151">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2152">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2152">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2153">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2154">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2155">De functie Func_chile_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2155">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2156">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_chile_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2156">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2157">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2157">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2158">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2158">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2159">De functie Func_chile_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2159">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2160">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2160">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2197">China Resident Identity Card (PRC) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2197">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2198">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2199">18 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2199">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2200">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2201">18 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2201">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2202">zes cijfers die een adrescode zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2202">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2203">acht cijfers in het formulier YYYYMMDD, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2203">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2204">drie cijfers die een ordercode zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2204">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2205">een cijfer dat een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2205">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2206">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2207">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2207">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2208">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2209">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2209">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2210">De functie Func_china_resident_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2210">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2211">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_china_resident_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2211">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2212">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2212">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2213">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2214">De functie Func_china_resident_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2214">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2215">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2215">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2228">Creditcardnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2228">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2229">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2230">14 tot 16 cijfers die kunnen worden opgemaakt of niet-opgemaakt (dddddd) en die de Luhn-toets moeten doorstaan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2230">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2231">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2232">Complex en robuust patroon dat kaarten van alle grote merken wereldwijd detecteert, waaronder Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, cadeaukaarten en dinerkaarten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2232">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2233">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2234">Ja, de Luhn-checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2234">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2235">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2236">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2237">De functie Func_credit_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2237">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2238">Een van de volgende gegevens is waar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-2239">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_cc_verification gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2239">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-2240">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_cc_name gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2240">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-2241">Met de Func_expiration_date wordt een datum in de juiste datumnotatie gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2241">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2242">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2243">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2243">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2244">De functie Func_credit_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2244">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2245">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2245">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2505">Nummer van het rijbewijs van KroatiÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2505">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2506">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2507">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2507">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2508">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2509">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2509">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2510">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2511">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2511">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2512">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2513">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2513">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2514">Met de normale  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2514">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2515">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2515">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2639">Nummer van kroatische identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2639">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-2640">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie maakt deel uit van het eu-nationale identificatienummer voor gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2640">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-2641">Het is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2641">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2642">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2642">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2643">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2643">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2644">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2644">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2645">negen opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2645">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2646">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2647">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2648">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2649">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2650">Met de Func_croatia_id_card wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2650">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2651">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_croatia_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2651">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2682">KroatiÃ«-paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2682">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2683">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2684">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2684">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2685">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2686">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2686">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2687">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2688">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2688">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2689">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2690">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2690">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2691">Met de normale  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2691">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2692">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2692">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2693">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2693">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2694">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2694">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2695">Met de normale  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2695">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2696">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2696">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2714">OIB-nummer (Persoonlijke identificatie van KroatiÃ«)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2714">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2715">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2715">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2716">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2716">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2717">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2717">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2718">11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2718">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2719">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2719">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2720">laatste cijfer is een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2720">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2721">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2721">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2722">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2722">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2723">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2723">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2724">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2724">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2725">De functie Func_croatia_oib_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2725">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2726">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2726">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2727">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2727">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2728">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2728">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2729">De functie Func_croatia_oib_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2729">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2730">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2730">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2761">Cyprus drivers license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2761">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2762">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2763">12 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2763">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2764">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2765">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2765">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2766">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2767">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2767">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2768">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2769">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2769">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2770">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2770">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2771">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2771">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2896">Cyprus-identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2896">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-2897">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2897">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2898">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2898">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2899">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2899">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2900">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2900">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2901">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2901">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2902">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2902">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2903">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2904">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2904">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2905">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2906">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2906">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2907">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2908">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2908">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2909">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2910">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2910">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2911">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2911">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2912">Er wordt een  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2912">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2921">Cyprus paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2921">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2922">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2923">een letter gevolgd door 6-8 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2923">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2924">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2925">een letter gevolgd door zes tot acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2925">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2926">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2926">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2927">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2927">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2928">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2928">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2929">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2929">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2930">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2930">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2931">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2931">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2932">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` indeling DD/MM/YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2932">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2933">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2933">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2934">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2934">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2935">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2935">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2964">Btw-nummer cyprus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2964">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-2965">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2965">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2966">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2966">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2967">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2967">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2968">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2968">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2969">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2969">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2970">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2970">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2971">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2972">acht cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2972">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2973">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2974">acht cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2974">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2975">een '0' of '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2975">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2976">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2976">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2977">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2977">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2978">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2979">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2979">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-2980">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-2981">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2981">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2982">Met de  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2982">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2983">Er wordt een  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2983">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-2984">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2984">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-2985">Met de  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-2985">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3013">Tsjechisch rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3013">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3014">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3014">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3015">twee letters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3015">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3016">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3016">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3017">acht letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3017">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3018">letter 'E' (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3018">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3019">een brief</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3019">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3020">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3020">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3021">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3021">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3022">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3023">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3023">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3024">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3025">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3026">Met de normale  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3026">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3027">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3027">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3153">Tsjechisch paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3153">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3154">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3155">acht cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3155">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3156">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3157">acht cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3157">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3158">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3159">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3159">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3160">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3161">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3161">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3162">Met de normale  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3162">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3163">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3163">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3164">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3164">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3165">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3165">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3166">Met de normale  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3166">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3167">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3167">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3189">Tsjechisch persoonlijk identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3189">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3190">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3191">negen cijfers met optionele slash (oude opmaak) 10 cijfers met optionele slash vooruit (nieuwe indeling)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3191">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3192">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3193">negen cijfers (oude notatie):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3193">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3194">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3194">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3195">een optionele slash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3195">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3196">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3196">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3197">10 cijfers (nieuwe indeling):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3197">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3198">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3198">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3199">een optionele slash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3199">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3200">vier cijfers waarbij het laatste cijfer een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3200">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3201">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3202">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3203">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3204">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3205">De functie Func_czech_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3205">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3206">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_czech_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3206">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3207">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3207">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3208">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3208">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3209">De functie Func_czech_id_card_new_format inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3209">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3210">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3257">Het rijbewijsnummer van Denemarken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3257">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3258">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3259">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3259">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3260">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3261">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3261">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3262">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3263">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3263">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3264">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3265">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3265">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3266">Met de normale  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3266">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3267">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3267">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3391">Denemarken paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3391">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3392">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3393">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3393">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3394">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3395">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3395">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3396">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3397">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3397">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3398">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3399">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3400">Met de normale  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3400">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3401">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3401">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3402">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date2` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YY of wordt een trefwoord uit `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3402">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3403">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3403">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3404">Met de normale  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3404">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3405">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3405">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3425">Persoonlijk identificatienummer van Denemarken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3425">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3426">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3427">10 cijfers met een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3427">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3428">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3428">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3429">10 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3429">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3430">zes cijfers in de indeling DDMMYY, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3430">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3431">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3431">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3432">vier cijfers waarbij het uiteindelijke cijfer een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3432">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3433">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3433">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3434">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3434">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3435">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3435">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3436">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3437">De normale expressie Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3437">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3438">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_denmark_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3438">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3439">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3439">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3440">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3440">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3441">De normale expressie Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3441">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3442">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3442">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3443">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3443">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3445">centrale personenregister</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3445">centrale personregister</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3446">civilt registreringssystem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3446">civilt registreringssystem</span></span>
