## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3514">Nummer van Het Bureau voor drugshandhaving (DEA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3514">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3515">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3516">twee letters gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3516">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3517">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3518">Patroon moet de volgende gegevens bevatten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3518">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3519">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) van deze set mogelijke letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, een registrantcode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3519">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3520">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet zaakgevoelig), de eerste letter van de achternaam of het cijfer '9' van de registrant</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3520">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3521">zeven cijfers, waarvan het laatste het controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3521">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3522">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3523">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3523">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3524">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3525">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3525">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3526">Met de Func_dea_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3526">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3527">Er wordt een `Keyword_dea_number` trefwoord uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3527">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3528">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3528">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3529">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3529">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3530">Met de Func_dea_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3530">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3531">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3531">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3532">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3532">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3534">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3534">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3535">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3535">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3536">beheer van drugshandhaving</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3536">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3537">instantie voor drugshandhaving</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3537">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3538">Estlands rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3538">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3539">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3540">twee letters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3540">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3541">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3542">twee letters en zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3542">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3543">de letters 'ET' (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3543">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3544">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3544">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3545">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3546">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3546">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3547">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3548">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3548">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3549">Met de normale  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3549">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3550">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3550">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3676">Estlandse persoonlijke identificatiecode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3676">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-3677">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3677">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3678">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3678">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3679">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3679">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3680">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3681">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3682">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3683">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3684">11 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3684">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3685">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3686">11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3687">een cijfer dat overeenkomt met geslacht en eeuw van geboorte (oneven getal man, even getal vrouw; 1-2: 19e eeuw; 3-4: 20e eeuw; 5-6: 21e eeuw)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3687">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3688">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3688">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3689">drie cijfers die overeenkomen met een serieel getal dat personen scheidt die op dezelfde datum zijn geboren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3689">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3690">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3690">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3691">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3692">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3693">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3694">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3695">Met de  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3695">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3696">Er wordt een  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3696">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-3697">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3698">Met de  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3698">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3731">Estlands paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3731">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3732">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3733">Ã©Ã©n letter gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3733">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3734">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3735">Ã©Ã©n letter gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3735">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3736">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3737">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3737">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3738">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3739">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3739">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3740">Met de normale  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3740">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3741">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3741">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3742">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3742">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3743">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3743">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3744">Met de normale  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3744">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3745">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3745">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3763">EU-betaalkaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3763">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3764">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3765">16 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3765">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3766">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3767">Complex en robuust patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3767">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3768">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3769">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3769">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-3770">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-3771">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3771">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3772">Met de Func_eu_debit_card wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3772">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3773">Ten minste een van de volgende gegevens is waar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3773">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-3774">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_eu_debit_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3774">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-3775">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_card_terms_dict gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3775">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-3776">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_card_security_terms_dict gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3776">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-3777">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3777">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-3778">Met de Func_expiration_date wordt een datum in de juiste datumnotatie gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3778">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-3779">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-3779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4226">Finland-nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4226">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4227">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4228">10 cijfers met een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4228">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4229">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4230">10 cijfers met een afbreekstreester:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4230">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4231">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4231">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4232">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4232">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4233">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4233">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4234">een cijfer of letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4234">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4235">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4236">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4236">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4237">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4238">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4238">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4239">Met de normale  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4239">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4240">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4240">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4371">Finland European Health Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4371">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-4372">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4372">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4373">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4373">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4374">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4374">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4375">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4375">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4376">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4376">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4377">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4377">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4378">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4379">20-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4379">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4380">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4381">20-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4381">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4382">10 cijfers - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4382">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4383">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4383">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4384">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4384">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4385">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4385">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4386">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4386">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4387">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4387">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4388">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4388">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4389">In de regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4389">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4390">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4390">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4408">Nationale finland-id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4408">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4409">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4410">zes cijfers plus een teken dat een eeuw plus drie cijfers plus een vinkje aangeeft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4410">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4411">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4412">Patroon moet de volgende gegevens bevatten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4412">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4413">zes cijfers in de indeling DDMMYY, een geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4413">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4414">century marker ('-', '+' of 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4414">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4415">persoonlijk identificatienummer met drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4415">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4416">een cijfer of letter (case insensitive) dat een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4416">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4417">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4418">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4418">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4419">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4420">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4420">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4421">de functie Func_finnish_national_id inhoud vindt die overeenkomt met het patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4421">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4422">een trefwoord uit Keyword_finnish_national_id wordt gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4422">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4423">de checksum passeert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4423">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4424">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4424">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4425">de functie Func_finnish_national_id inhoud vindt die overeenkomt met het patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4425">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4426">de checksum passeert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4426">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4475">Finland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4475">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4476">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is beschikbaar in het type gevoelige informatie van het EU-paspoortnummer en is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4476">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4477">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4477">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-4478">combinatie van negen letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4478">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4479">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4479">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-4480">combinatie van negen letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4480">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4481">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4481">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4482">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4482">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4483">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4483">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4484">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4484">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4485">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4485">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4486">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4486">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4487">Met de normale `Regex_finland_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4487">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4488">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_finland_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4488">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4489">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4489">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4490">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4490">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4491">Met de normale `Regex_finland_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4491">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4492">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_finland_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4492">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4516">Rijbewijsnummer van Frankrijk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4516">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4517">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is beschikbaar in het type gevoelige informatie over het EU-rijbewijsnummer en is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4517">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4518">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4519">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4519">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4520">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4521">12 cijfers met validatie om vergelijkbare patronen, zoals Franse telefoonnummers, te korting te geven</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4521">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4522">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4523">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4523">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4524">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4525">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4526">de functie Func_french_drivers_license inhoud vindt die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4526">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4527">een trefwoord uit Keyword_french_drivers_license wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4527">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4654">Frankrijk gezondheidsverzekeringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4654">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-4655">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4655">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4656">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4656">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4657">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4657">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4658">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4658">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4659">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4659">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4660">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4660">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4661">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4662">21-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4662">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4663">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4664">21-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4664">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4665">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4665">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4666">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4666">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4667">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4667">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4668">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4669">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4669">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4670">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4671">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4671">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4672">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4673">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4673">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4674">de regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4674">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4675">een trefwoord uit Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4675">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4676">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4676">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4677">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4677">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4678">verzekeringskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4678">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4679">carte vitaal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4679">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4680">carte d'assurÃ© sociaal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4680">carte d'assurÃ© social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4681">Franse nationale id-kaart (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4681">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4682">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4683">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4683">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4684">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4685">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4685">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4686">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4686">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4687">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4687">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4688">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4688">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4689">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4689">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4690">De normale expressie Regex_france_cni inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4690">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4691">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4691">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4705">Frankrijk paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4705">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-4706">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is beschikbaar in het gevoelige informatietype EU-paspoortnummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4706">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-4707">Het is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4707">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4708">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4709">negen cijfers en letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4709">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4710">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4710">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4711">negen cijfers en letters:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4711">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4712">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4712">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4713">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4713">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4714">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4714">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4715">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4716">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4716">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4717">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4718">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4718">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4719">Met de `Func_fr_passport` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4719">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4720">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4720">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4721">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date3` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YYYY of wordt een trefwoord van `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4721">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4722">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4722">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4723">Met de `Func_fr_passport` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4723">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4724">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4724">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4755">Frankrijkse socialezekerheidsnummer (INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4755">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4756">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4757">15 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4757">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4758">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4759">Moet overeenkomen met een van de twee patronen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4759">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4760">13 cijfers gevolgd door een spatie gevolgd door twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4760">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-4761">of</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4761">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4762">15 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4762">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4763">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4764">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4764">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4765">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4766">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4766">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4767">Met de `Func_french_insee` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4767">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4768">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_fr_insee gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4768">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4769">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4769">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4770">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4770">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4771">Met de functie Func_french_insee of Func_fr_insee wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4771">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4772">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4772">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4803">Frankrijk btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4803">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4804">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4805">13 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4805">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4806">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4807">13 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4807">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4808">EÃ©n cijfer dat 0, 1, 2 of 3 moet zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4808">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4809">EÃ©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4809">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4810">Een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4810">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4811">Twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4811">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4812">Een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4812">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4813">Drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4813">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4814">Een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4814">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4815">Drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4815">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4816">Een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4816">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4817">Drie controlecijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4817">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4818">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4818">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4819">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4819">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4820">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4820">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4821">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4821">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4822">Met de  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4822">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4823">Er wordt een  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4823">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-4824">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4824">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4825">Met de  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4825">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numÃ©ro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4845">Frankrijk btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4845">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-4846">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4846">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4847">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4847">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4848">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4848">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4849">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4849">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4850">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4850">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4851">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4851">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4852">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4853">Alfanumeriek patroon van 13 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4853">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4854">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4855">Alfanumeriek patroon van 13 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4855">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4856">twee letters - FR (hoofdletters ongevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4856">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4857">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4857">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4858">twee letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4858">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4859">een optionele spatie, punt, afbreekstreester of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4859">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4860">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4860">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4861">een optionele spatie, punt, afbreekstreester of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4861">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4862">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4862">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4863">een optionele spatie, punt, afbreekstreester of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4863">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4864">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4864">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4865">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4866">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4866">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4867">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4868">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4868">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4869">Met de Func_france_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4869">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4870">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4870">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4871">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4871">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4872">Met de Func_france_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4872">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4885">Het rijbewijsnummer van Duitsland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4885">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4886">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is opgenomen in het gevoelige informatietype EU-rijbewijsnummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4886">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-4887">Het is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4887">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4888">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4889">combinatie van 11 cijfers en letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4889">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4890">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4891">11 cijfers en letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4891">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4892">een cijfer of letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4892">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4893">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4893">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4894">zes cijfers of letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4894">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4895">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4895">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4896">een cijfer of letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4896">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4897">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4898">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4898">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-4899">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-4900">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4900">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4901">De functie Func_german_drivers_license inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4901">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4902">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_german_drivers_license_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4902">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-4903">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-4903">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5052">Duitsland-identiteitskaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5052">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5053">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5054">sinds 1 november 2010: Negen letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5054">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5055">van 1 april 1987 tot en met 31 oktober 2010: 10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5055">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5056">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5057">sinds 1 november 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5057">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5058">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5058">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5059">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5059">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5060">van 1 april 1987 tot en met 31 oktober 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5060">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5061">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5061">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5062">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5063">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5063">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5064">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5065">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5065">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5066">De normale expressie Regex_germany_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5066">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5067">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_germany_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5067">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
