## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5083">Duitsland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5083">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5084">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is opgenomen in het type gevoelige informatie van het EU-paspoortnummer en is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5084">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5085">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5086">10 cijfers of letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5086">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5087">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5088">Patroon moet de volgende gegevens bevatten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5088">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5089">eerste teken is een cijfer of een letter uit deze set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5089">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5090">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5090">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5091">vijf cijfers of letters uit deze set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5091">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5092">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5092">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5093">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5093">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5094">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5094">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5095">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5095">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5096">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5096">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5097">De functie Func_german_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5097">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5098">Een trefwoord `Keyword_german_passport` van of `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5098">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5099">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5099">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5100">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5100">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5101">De functie Func_german_passport_data inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5101">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5102">Een trefwoord `Keyword_german_passport` van of `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5102">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5103">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5103">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5126">Btw-nummer duitsland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5126">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5127">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5128">11 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5128">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5129">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5130">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5130">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5131">Twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5131">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5132">Een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5132">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5133">Drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5133">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5134">Een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5134">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5135">Drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5135">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5136">Een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5136">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5137">Twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5137">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5138">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5138">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5139">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5140">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5140">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5141">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5142">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5142">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5143">Met de  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5143">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5144">Er wordt een  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5144">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-5145">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5145">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5146">Met de  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5146">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5172">Duitsland btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5172">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-5173">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5173">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5174">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5174">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5175">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5175">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5176">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5176">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5177">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5177">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5178">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5178">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5179">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5180">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5180">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5181">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5182">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5182">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5183">een letter D of d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5183">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5184">een letter E of e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5184">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5185">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5185">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5186">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5186">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5187">een optionele spatie of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5187">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5188">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5188">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5189">een optionele spatie of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5189">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5190">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5191">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5192">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5192">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5193">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5194">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5194">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5195">De functie Func_germany_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5195">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5196">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5196">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5197">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5197">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5198">De functie Func_germany_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5198">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5208">Licentienummer van Griekenland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5208">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5209">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie maakt deel uit van het type gevoelige informatie over het EU-rijbewijsnummer en is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5209">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5210">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5211">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5211">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5212">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5213">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5213">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5214">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5215">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5215">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5216">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5217">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5217">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5218">Met de normale  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5218">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5219">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5219">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5345">Nationale Griekenland-id-kaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5345">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5346">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5346">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5347">Combinatie van 7-8 letters en cijfers plus een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5347">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5348">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5348">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5349">Zeven letters en cijfers (oude notatie):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5349">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5350">EÃ©n letter (een letter van het Griekse alfabet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5350">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5351">Een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5351">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5352">Zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5352">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5353">Acht letters en cijfers (nieuwe notatie):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5353">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5354">Twee letters waarvan het hoofdletterteken voorkomt in zowel het Griekse als het Latijnse alfabet (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5354">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5355">Een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5355">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5356">Zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5356">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5357">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5358">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5358">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5359">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5360">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5360">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5361">De normale expressie Regex_greece_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5361">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5362">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_greece_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5362">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5363">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5363">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5364">De normale expressie Regex_greece_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5364">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5375">Griekenland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5375">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5376">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5377">Twee letters gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5377">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5378">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5379">Twee letters gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5379">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5380">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5381">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5381">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5382">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5383">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5384">Met de normale  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5384">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5385">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5385">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5386">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM YY (voorbeeld - 28 aug 19) of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` gevonden van</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5386">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5387">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5388">Met de normale  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5388">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5389">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5404">Î±ÏÎ¹Î¸Î¼Î¿ÏÏ Î´Î¹Î±Î²Î±ÏÎ·ÏÎ¯Î¿Ï</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5404">Î±ÏÎ¹Î¸Î¼Î¿ÏÏ Î´Î¹Î±Î²Î±ÏÎ·ÏÎ¯Î¿Ï</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5405">Î±ÏÎ¹Î¸Î¼ÏÏ Î´Î¹Î±Î²Î±ÏÎ·ÏÎ¹Î¿</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5405">Î±ÏÎ¹Î¸Î¼ÏÏ Î´Î¹Î±Î²Î±ÏÎ·ÏÎ¹Î¿</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5406">Griekenland-nummer voor sociale zekerheid (AMKA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5406">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-5407">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5407">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5408">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5408">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5409">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5409">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5410">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5410">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5411">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5411">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5412">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5412">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5413">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5414">Elf cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5414">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5415">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5415">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5416">6 cijfers als geboortedatum YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5416">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5417">4 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5417">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5418">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5418">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5419">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5420">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5420">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5421">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5422">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5422">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5423">Met de  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5423">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5424">Er wordt een  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5424">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-5425">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5425">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5426">Met de  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5426">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5437">Btw-nummer van Griekenland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5437">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-5438">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5438">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5439">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5439">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5440">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5440">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5441">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5441">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5442">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5442">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5443">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5443">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5444">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5445">Negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5445">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5446">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5447">Negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5447">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5448">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5448">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5449">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5449">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5450">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5450">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5451">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5451">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5452">Met de normale  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5452">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5453">Er wordt een  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5453">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5482">Hongkong-identiteitskaartnummer (HKID)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5482">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5483">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5484">Combinatie van 8-9 letters en cijfers plus optionele haakjes rond het uiteindelijke teken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5484">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5485">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5486">Combinatie van 8-9 letters:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5486">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5487">1-2 letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5487">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5488">Zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5488">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5489">Het uiteindelijke teken (elk cijfer of de letter A), dat het controlecijfer is en optioneel tussen haakjes wordt omsloten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5489">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5490">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5490">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5491">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5491">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5492">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5492">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5493">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5493">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5494">De functie Func_hong_kong_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5494">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5495">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_hong_kong_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5495">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5496">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5496">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5497">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5497">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5498">De functie Func_hong_kong_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5498">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5499">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5499">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5539">Rijbewijsnummer van Hongarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5539">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5540">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5540">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5541">Twee letters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5541">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5542">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5542">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5543">Twee letters en zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5543">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5544">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5544">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5545">Zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5545">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5546">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5547">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5547">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5548">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5549">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5549">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5550">Met de normale  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5550">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5551">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5551">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5676">Persoonlijk identificatienummer van Hongarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5676">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-5677">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5677">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5678">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5678">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5679">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5679">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5680">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5681">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5682">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5683">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5684">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5684">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5685">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5686">11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5687">EÃ©n cijfer dat overeenkomt met geslacht (1-man, 2-vrouw, andere getallen zijn ook mogelijk voor burgers die vÃ³Ã³r 1900 zijn geboren of voor burgers met een dubbele nationaliteit)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5687">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5688">Zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5688">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5689">Drie cijfers die overeenkomen met een serieel getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5689">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5690">EÃ©n vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5690">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5691">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5692">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5693">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5694">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5695">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5695">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5696">Er wordt een  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5696">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-5697">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5698">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5698">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5709">Paspoortnummer van Hongarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5709">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5710">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5710">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5711">Twee letters gevolgd door zes of zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5711">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5712">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5712">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5713">Twee letters gevolgd door zes of zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5713">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5714">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5714">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5715">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5715">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5716">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5716">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5717">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5717">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5718">Met de normale  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5718">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5719">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5719">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5720">Met de normale expressie wordt datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (Voorbeeld - 01 MÃR/MAR 12) of een trefwoord uit `Keywords_eu_passport_date` wordt gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5720">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÃR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5721">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5721">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5722">Met de normale  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5722">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5723">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5723">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5743">Hongarijese sociale zekerheidsnummer (TAJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5743">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5744">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5745">Negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5745">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5746">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5747">Negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5747">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5748">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5749">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5749">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5750">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5751">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5752">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5752">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5753">Er wordt een  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5753">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-5754">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5754">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5755">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5755">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml

      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5775">Btw-nummer van Hongarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5775">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-5776">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5776">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5777">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5777">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5778">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5778">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5779">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5779">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5780">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5780">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5781">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5781">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5782">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5783">10 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5783">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5784">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5785">10 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5785">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5786">EÃ©n cijfer dat '8' moet zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5786">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5787">Acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5787">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5788">EÃ©n vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5788">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5789">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5790">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5790">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5791">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5792">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5792">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5793">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5793">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5794">Er wordt een  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5794">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-5795">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5795">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5796">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5796">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5822">Btw-nummer in Hongarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5822">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-5823">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5824">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5825">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5826">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5827">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5828">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5829">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5830">Alfanumeriek patroon van 10 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5830">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5831">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5832">Alfanumeriek patroon van 10 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5832">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5833">twee letters - HU of hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5833">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5836">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5837">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5837">Yes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5839">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5839">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5840">Met de Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5840">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5841">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5841">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5842">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5842">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5843">Met de Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5843">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5857">India permanent accountnummer (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5857">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5858">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5859">10 letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5859">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5860">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5860">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5861">10 letters of cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5861">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5862">Drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5862">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5863">Een letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5863">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5864">Een brief</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5864">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5865">Vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5865">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5866">Een letter die een alfabetisch controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5866">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5867">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5867">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5868">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5868">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5869">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5869">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5870">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5870">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5871">De normale expressie Regex_india_permanent_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5871">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5872">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_india_permanent_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5872">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5873">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5873">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5874">De normale expressie Regex_india_permanent_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5874">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5879">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5879">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5880">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5881">12 cijfers met optionele spaties of streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5881">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5882">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5883">12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5883">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5884">Een cijfer dat niet 0 of 1 is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5884">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5885">Drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5885">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5886">Een optionele spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5886">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5887">Vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5887">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5888">Een optionele spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5888">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5889">Het laatste cijfer, dat het controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5889">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5890">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5891">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5891">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5892">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5893">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5893">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5894">Met de Func_india_aadhaar wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5894">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5895">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_india_aadhar gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5895">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5896">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5896">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="43275-5897">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5897">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5898">Met de Func_india_aadhaar wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5898">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5899">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5899">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
