## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5908">KTP-nummer (Indonesia Identity Card)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5908">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5909">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5910">16 cijfers met optionele perioden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5910">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5911">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5912">16 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5912">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5913">Provinciecode met twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5913">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5914">Een punt (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5914">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5915">Regency of stadscode met twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5915">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5916">Subdistrictcode met twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5916">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5917">Een punt (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5917">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5918">Zes cijfers in de indeling DDMMYY, die de geboortedatum zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5918">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5919">Een punt (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5919">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5920">Vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5920">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5921">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5921">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5922">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5922">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5923">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5923">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5924">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5924">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5925">De normale expressie Regex_indonesia_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5925">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5926">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_indonesia_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5926">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5931">Nomor Induk Kependukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5931">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5932">Internationaal bankrekeningnummer (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5932">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5933">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5933">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5934">Landcode (twee letters) plus controlecijfers (twee cijfers) plus bbannummer (maximaal 30 tekens)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5934">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5935">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5935">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5936">Patroon moet de volgende gegevens bevatten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5936">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5937">Landcode met twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5937">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5938">Twee controlecijfers (gevolgd door een optionele spatie)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5938">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5939">1-7 groepen van vier letters of cijfers (kunnen worden gescheiden door spaties)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5939">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5940">1-3 letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5940">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5941">De notatie voor elk land is iets anders.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5941">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-5942">Het type IBAN-gevoelige informatie bestrijkt deze 60 landen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5942">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk , sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5944">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5945">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5945">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5946">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5947">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5948">Met de Func_iban wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5948">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5949">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5949">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5951">Geen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5951">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5952">Internationale classificatie van ziektes (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5952">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5953">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5953">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5954">Woordenlijst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5954">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5955">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5956">Trefwoord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5956">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5957">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5958">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5958">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5959">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5960">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5960">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5961">Er wordt een trefwoord Dictionary_icd_10_updated gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5961">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5962">Er wordt een trefwoord Dictionary_icd_10_codes gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5962">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5963">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5963">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5964">Er wordt een trefwoord Dictionary_icd_10_ bijgewerkt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5964">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5965">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5965">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5970">Internationale classificatie van ziektes (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5970">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5971">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5972">Woordenlijst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5972">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5973">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5974">Trefwoord</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5974">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5975">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5976">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5976">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5977">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5978">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5978">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5979">Er wordt een trefwoord Dictionary_icd_9_updated gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5979">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5980">Er wordt een trefwoord Dictionary_icd_9_codes gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5980">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5981">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5982">Er wordt een trefwoord Dictionary_icd_9_updated gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5982">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5988">IP-adres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5988">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5989">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5989">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5990">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5990">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-5991">Complex patroon dat bestand is voor opgemaakte (perioden) en niet-opgemaakte versies (geen perioden) van de IPv4-adressen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5991">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5992">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5992">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-5993">Complex patroon dat bestand is voor opgemaakte IPv6-getallen (inclusief dubbele punt)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5993">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5994">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5994">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5995">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5995">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5996">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5996">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-5997">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5997">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-5998">Voor IPv6 heeft een DLP-beleid er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5998">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-5999">De normale expressie Regex_ipv6_address inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-5999">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6000">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_ipaddress gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6000">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6001">Voor IPv4 heeft een DLP-beleid er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6001">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6002">De normale expressie Regex_ipv4_address inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6002">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6003">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ipaddress gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6003">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6004">Voor IPv6 heeft een DLP-beleid er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6004">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6005">De normale expressie Regex_ipv6_address inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6005">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6006">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_ipaddress gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6006">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6014">Nummer van ierlands rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6014">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6015">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6016">Zes cijfers, gevolgd door vier letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6016">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6017">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6018">Zes cijfers en vier letters:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6018">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6019">Zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6019">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6020">Vier letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6020">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6021">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6021">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6022">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6022">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6023">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6023">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6024">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6024">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6025">Met de normale  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6025">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6026">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6026">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6150">Ierland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6150">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6151">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6152">Twee letters of cijfers gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6152">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6153">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6154">Twee letters of cijfers, gevolgd door zeven cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6154">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6155">Twee cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6155">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6156">Zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6156">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6157">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6157">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6158">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6158">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6159">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6159">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6160">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6160">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6161">Met de normale  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6161">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6162">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6162">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6163">Met de normale expressie wordt datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Voorbeeld - 01 BEA/MEI 1988) of een trefwoord uit `Keywords_eu_passport_date` wordt gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6163">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6164">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6165">Met de normale  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6165">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6166">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6166">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6190">Nummer van persoonlijke openbare service (PPS) van Ierland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6190">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6191">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6192">Oude notatie (tot 31 december 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6192">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6193">zeven cijfers gevolgd door 1-2 letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6193">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6194">Nieuwe notatie (1 januari 2013 en daarna):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6194">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6195">zeven cijfers gevolgd door twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6195">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6196">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6197">Oude notatie (tot 31 december 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6197">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6198">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6198">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6199">Ã©Ã©n tot twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6199">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6200">Nieuwe notatie (1 januari 2013 en daarna):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6200">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6201">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6201">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6202">een letter (niet case-sensitive) die een alfabetisch vinkje is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6202">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6203">Een optionele letter in het bereik A-I of 'W'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6203">An optional letter in the range A-I, or âWâ</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6204">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6205">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6205">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6206">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6207">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6207">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6208">Met de Func_ireland_pps wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6208">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6209">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6209">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6210">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6211">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6211">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6212">Met de Func_ireland_pps wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6212">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6213">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6213">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6258">IsraÃ«ls bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6258">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6259">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6259">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6260">13 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6260">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6261">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6261">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6262">Opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6262">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6263">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6263">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6264">een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6264">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6265">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6265">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6266">een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6266">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6267">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6267">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6268">Niet-opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6268">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6269">13 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6269">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6270">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6271">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6271">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6272">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6273">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6273">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6274">De normale expressie Regex_israel_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6274">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6275">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_israel_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6275">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6282">Nationaal identificatienummer van IsraÃ«l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6282">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6283">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6284">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6284">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6285">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6286">negen opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6286">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6287">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6287">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6288">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6288">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6289">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6289">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6290">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6290">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6291">De functie Func_israeli_national_id_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6291">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6292">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Israel_National_ID gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6292">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6293">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6293">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6312">Nummer van het rijbewijs van ItaliÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6312">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6313">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie maakt deel uit van het type gevoelige informatie over het EU-rijbewijsnummer en is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6313">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6314">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6314">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6315">een combinatie van 10 letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6315">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6316">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6316">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6317">een combinatie van 10 letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6317">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6318">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6318">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6319">de letter "A" of "V" (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6319">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6320">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6320">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6321">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6321">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6322">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6323">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6323">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6324">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6325">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6326">Met de normale `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6326">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6327">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6327">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6454">Fiscale code van ItaliÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6454">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-6455">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6455">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6456">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6456">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6457">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6457">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6458">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6458">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6459">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6459">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6460">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6460">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6461">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6462">een combinatie van letters en cijfers met 16 tekens in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6462">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6463">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6464">Een combinatie van 16 tekens van letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6464">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6465">drie letters die overeenkomen met de eerste drie medeklinkers in de familienaam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6465">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6466">drie letters die overeenkomen met de eerste, derde en vierde medeklinker in de voornaam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6466">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6467">twee cijfers die overeenkomen met de laatste cijfers van het geboortejaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6467">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6468">een letter die overeenkomt met de letter voor de maand van de geboorte: letters worden in alfabetische volgorde gebruikt, maar alleen de letters A tot en met E, H, L, M, P, R tot en met T worden gebruikt (januari is dus A en oktober is R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6468">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birthâletters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6469">twee cijfers die overeenkomen met de dag van de maand van de geboorte: om onderscheid te maken tussen geslachten, wordt 40 toegevoegd aan de geboortedatum voor vrouwen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6469">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birthâin order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6470">vier cijfers die overeenkomen met de gebiedscode die specifiek is voor de gemeente waar de persoon is geboren (landcodes worden gebruikt voor het buitenland)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6470">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6471">Ã©Ã©n pariteitscijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6471">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6472">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6472">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6473">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6473">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6474">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6474">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6475">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6475">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6476">Met de  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6476">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6477">Er wordt een  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6477">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-6478">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6478">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6479">Met de  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6479">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6514">ItaliÃ« paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6514">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6515">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6516">twee letters of cijfers gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6516">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6517">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6518">twee letters of cijfers, gevolgd door zeven cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6518">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6519">twee cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6519">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6520">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6520">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6521">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6521">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6522">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6522">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6523">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6523">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6524">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6524">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6525">Met de normale  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6525">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6526">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6526">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6527">De normale expressie vindt datum in de indeling `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Voorbeeld - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) of een trefwoord uit `Keywords_eu_passport_date` wordt gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6527">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6528">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6528">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6529">Met de normale  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6529">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6530">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6530">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6543">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6543">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6544">italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6544">italiana passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6545">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6545">passaporto italiana</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6554">#A0 #A0 #A0 #A0 #A0 #A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6554">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-6555">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6555">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6556">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6556">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6557">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6557">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6558">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6558">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6559">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6559">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6560">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6560">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6561">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6562">Alfanumeriek patroon van 13 tekens met optionele scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6562">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6563">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6564">13 tekens alfanumeriek patroon met optionele scheidingstekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6564">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6565">Ik of ik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6565">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6566">T of t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6566">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6567">optionele spatie, punt, afbreekstreester of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6567">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6568">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6568">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6569">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6570">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6570">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6571">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6572">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6572">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6573">Met de Func_italy_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6573">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6574">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6574">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6575">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6575">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6576">Met de Func_italy_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6576">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6577">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6577">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6578">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6578">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6584">Japans bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6584">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6585">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6586">zeven of acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6586">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6587">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6588">bankrekeningnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6588">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6589">zeven of acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6589">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6590">bankrekeningstakcode:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6590">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6591">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6591">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6592">een spatie of streepje (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6592">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6593">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6593">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6594">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6594">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6595">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6595">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6596">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6596">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6597">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6597">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6598">Met de Func_jp_bank_account wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6598">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6599">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_bank_account gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6599">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6600">Een van de volgende gegevens is waar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6600">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6601">De functie Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6601">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6602">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6602">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6603">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6603">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6604">Met de Func_jp_bank_account wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6604">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6605">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_bank_account gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6605">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6652">Japans rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6652">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6653">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6654">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6654">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6655">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6656">12 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6656">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6657">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6658">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6659">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6660">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6660">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6661">Met de Func_jp_drivers_license_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6661">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6700">Japan My Number - Corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6700">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-6701">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6701">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6716">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6716">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6717">De functie Func_japanese_my_number_corporate inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6717">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6718">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6718">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6719">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6719">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6720">De functie Func_japanese_my_number_corporate inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6720">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6747">een optionele spatie, punt of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6747">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6755">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6755">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6769">Japan paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6769">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6770">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6770">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6771">twee letters gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6771">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6772">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6772">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6773">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6773">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6774">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6774">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6775">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6775">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6776">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6776">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6777">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6777">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6778">De functie Func_jp_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6778">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6779">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_passport gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6779">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6796">Japan residence card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6796">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6797">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6798">12 letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6798">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6799">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6800">12 letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6800">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6801">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6801">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6802">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6802">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6803">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6803">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6804">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6805">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6806">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6807">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6808">De normale expressie Regex_jp_residence_card_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6808">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6809">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_residence_card_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6809">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6818">Japans registratienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6818">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6821">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6822">11 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6822">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6823">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6823">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6826">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6826">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6827">Met de Func_jp_resident_registration_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6827">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
