## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6841">Japans sociaal verzekeringsnummer (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6841">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6842">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6843">7-12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6843">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6844">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6844">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6845">7-12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6845">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6846">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6846">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6847">een afbreekstreester (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6847">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6848">zes cijfers OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6848">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6849">7-12 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6849">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6850">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6851">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6851">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6852">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6853">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6853">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6854">Met de Func_jp_sin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6854">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6855">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6855">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6856">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6857">Met de Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6857">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6858">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6858">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6879">Letlandse nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6879">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6880">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6881">drie letters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6881">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6882">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6883">drie letters en zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6883">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6884">drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6884">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6885">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6885">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6886">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6886">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6887">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6887">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-6888">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6888">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-6889">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6889">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6890">Met de normale  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6890">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-6891">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-6891">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7016">Persoonlijke code letland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7016">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7017">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7018">11 cijfers en een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7018">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7019">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7019">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7020">Oude indeling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7020">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7021">11 cijfers en een afbreekstreester:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7021">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7022">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7022">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7023">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7023">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7024">een cijfer dat overeenkomt met de eeuw van geboorte ("0" voor de 19e eeuw, "1" voor de 20e eeuw en "2" voor de 21e eeuw)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7024">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7025">vier cijfers, willekeurig gegenereerd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7025">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7026">Nieuwe indeling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7026">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7027">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7027">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7028">Twee cijfers "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7028">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7029">Negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7029">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7030">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7030">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7031">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7031">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7032">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7032">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7033">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7033">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7034">Met de  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` functie of regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7034">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7035">Er wordt een  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7035">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-7036">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7037">Met de  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` functie of regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7037">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7100">Letland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7100">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7101">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7102">twee letters of cijfers gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7102">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7103">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7104">twee letters of cijfers, gevolgd door zeven cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7104">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7105">twee cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7105">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7106">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7106">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7107">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7108">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7108">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7109">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7110">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7111">Met de normale  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7111">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7112">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7113">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7113">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7114">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7114">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7115">Met de normale  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7115">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7116">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7116">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7139">Litouws rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7139">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7140">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7141">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7141">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7142">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7143">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7143">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7144">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7144">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7145">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7145">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7146">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7146">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7147">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7147">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7148">Met de normale  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7148">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7149">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7149">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7274">Persoonlijke code litouwen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7274">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-7275">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7275">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7276">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7276">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7277">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7277">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7278">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7278">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7279">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7279">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7280">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7280">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7281">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7282">11 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7282">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7283">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7284">11 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7284">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7285">Ã©Ã©n cijfer (1-6) dat overeenkomt met het geslacht en de eeuw van de geboorte van de persoon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7285">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7286">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7286">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7287">drie cijfers die overeenkomen met het seriÃ«le getal van de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7287">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7288">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7288">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7289">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7290">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7290">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7291">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7292">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7292">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7293">Met de  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7293">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7294">Er wordt een  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7294">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-7295">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7295">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7296">Met de  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7296">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7331">Litouws paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7331">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7332">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7333">acht cijfers of letters zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7333">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7334">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7335">acht cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7335">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7336">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7337">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7337">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7338">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7339">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7339">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7340">Met de normale  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7340">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7341">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7341">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7342">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date3` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YYYY of wordt een trefwoord van `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7342">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7343">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7343">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7344">Met de normale  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7344">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7345">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7345">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7365">Luxemburgs rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7365">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7366">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7367">zes cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7367">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7368">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7369">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7369">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7370">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7371">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7371">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7372">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7373">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7373">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7374">Met de normale  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7374">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7375">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7375">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7499">Luxemburgs nationaal identificatienummer (natuurlijke personen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7499">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-7500">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7500">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7501">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7501">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7502">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7502">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7503">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7503">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7504">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7504">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7505">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7505">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7506">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7507">13 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7507">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7508">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7509">13 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7509">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7510">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7510">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7511">twee controlecijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7511">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7512">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7513">ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7513">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7514">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7515">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7515">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7516">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7516">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7517">Er wordt een  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7517">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7518">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7518">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7519">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7519">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7542">Luxemburgs paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7542">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7543">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7544">acht cijfers of letters zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7544">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7545">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7546">acht cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7546">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7547">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7547">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7548">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7548">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7549">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7549">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7550">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7550">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7551">Met de normale  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7551">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7552">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7552">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7553">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date3` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YYYY of wordt een trefwoord van `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7553">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7554">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7554">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7555">Met de normale  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7555">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7556">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7556">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7588">Luxemburgs nationaal identificatienummer (niet-natuurlijke personen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7588">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7589">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7589">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7590">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7590">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7591">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7591">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7592">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7592">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7593">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7594">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7594">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7595">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7595">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7596">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7596">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7597">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7597">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7598">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7598">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7599">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7599">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7600">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7600">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7601">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7602">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7602">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7603">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7604">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7604">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7605">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7605">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7606">Er wordt een  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7606">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-7607">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7607">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7608">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7608">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7648">Nummer van maleisische identificatiekaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7648">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7649">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7649">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7650">12 cijfers met optionele afbreekstree streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7650">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7651">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7651">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7652">12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7652">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7653">zes cijfers in de notatie YYMMDD, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7653">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7654">een streepje (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7654">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7655">Plaats-van-geboortecode met twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7655">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7656">een streepje (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7656">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7657">drie willekeurige cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7657">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7658">geslachtscode met Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7658">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7659">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7660">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7661">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7662">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7662">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7663">De normale expressie Regex_malaysia_id_card_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7663">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7664">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7664">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7691">Malta-nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7691">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7692">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7693">Combinatie van twee tekens en zes cijfers in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7693">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7694">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7695">combinatie van twee tekens en zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7695">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7696">twee tekens (cijfers of letters, niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7696">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7697">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7697">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7698">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7698">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7699">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7699">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7700">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7700">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7701">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7702">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7702">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7703">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7704">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7705">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7705">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7706">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7838">zeven cijfers, gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7838">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7845">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7846">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7847">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7847">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7848">Er wordt een  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7848">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-7849">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7849">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7850">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7850">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7867">Malta-paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7867">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7868">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7869">zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7869">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7870">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7871">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7871">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7872">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7873">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7873">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7874">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7875">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7876">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7876">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7877">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7877">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7878">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trefwoord uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7878">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7879">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7879">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7880">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7880">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7881">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7881">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7901">Malta-nummer voor belastingidentificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7901">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7902">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7903">Voor Maltese nationals:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7903">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7904">zeven cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7904">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="43275-7905">Niet-Maltese nationals en Maltese entiteiten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7905">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7906">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7906">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7907">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7908">Maltese nationals: zeven cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7908">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7909">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7909">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7910">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7910">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-7911">Niet-Maltese nationals en Maltese entiteiten: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7911">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7912">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7912">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7913">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7914">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7914">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7915">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7916">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7916">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7917">De regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7917">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7918">Er wordt een  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7918">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-7919">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7919">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7920">De regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7920">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7953">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI)-kaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7953">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7954">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7954">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7955">alfanumeriek patroon van elf tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7955">eleven character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7956">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7956">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7957">Ã©Ã©n cijfer tussen 1 en 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7957">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7958">Ã©Ã©n letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7958">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7959">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7959">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7960">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7960">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7961">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7961">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7962">Ã©Ã©n letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7962">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7963">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7963">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7964">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7964">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7965">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7965">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7966">twee letters exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7966">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7967">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7967">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7968">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7968">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7969">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7969">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7970">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7970">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7971">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7971">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7972">Met de normale  `Regex_mbi_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7972">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7973">Er wordt een  `Keyword_mbi_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7973">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-7974">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7974">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7975">Met de normale  `Regex_mbi_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7975">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7976">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7976">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7978">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7978">mbi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7979">mbi #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7979">mbi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7980">hospik zijn begunstigden #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7980">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7981">medicare beneficiary identifier</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7981">medicare beneficiary identifier</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7982">hospik zijn geen begunstigden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7982">medicare beneficiary no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7983">hospik zijn begunstigdennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7983">medicare beneficiary number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7984">hospik zijn begunstigden #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7984">medicare beneficiary#</span></span>


## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7985">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7985">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7986">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7986">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7987">Alfanumeriek patroon van 18 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7987">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7988">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7988">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7989">vier letters (hoofdletters ongevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7989">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7990">zes cijfers die een geldige datum aangeven</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7990">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7991">een letter - H/h of M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7991">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7992">twee letters die een geldige Mexicaanse staatscode aangeven</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7992">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7993">drie letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7993">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7994">Ã©Ã©n letter of cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7994">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-7995">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7995">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7996">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7996">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7997">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7997">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-7998">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7998">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-7999">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-7999">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8000">Met de  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8000">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8001">Er wordt een  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8001">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-8002">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8002">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8003">Met de  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8003">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
