## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8024">BSN-nummer (Nederlandse burgerservice)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8024">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8025">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8025">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8026">acht of negen cijfers met optionele spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8026">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8027">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8027">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8028">acht-negen cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8028">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8029">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8029">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8030">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8030">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8031">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8031">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8032">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8032">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8033">twee-drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8033">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8034">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8034">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8035">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8035">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8036">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8036">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8037">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8037">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8038">De functie Func_netherlands_bsn inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8038">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8039">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_netherlands_bsn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8039">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8040">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8040">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8064">Nederlands rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8064">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8065">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8066">tien cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8066">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8067">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8067">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8068">tien cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8068">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8069">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8069">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8070">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8070">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8071">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8071">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8072">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8072">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8073">Met de normale  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8073">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8074">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8074">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8202">Nederlands paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8202">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8203">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8204">negen letters of cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8204">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8205">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8206">negen letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8206">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8207">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8207">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8208">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8208">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8209">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8209">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8210">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8210">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8211">Met de normale  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8211">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8212">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8212">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8213">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Voorbeeld - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8213">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8214">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8214">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8215">Met de normale  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8215">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8216">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8216">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8234">Btw-nummer van Nederland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8234">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-8235">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8235">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8236">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8236">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8237">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8237">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8238">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8238">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8239">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8239">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8240">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8240">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8241">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8242">negen cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8242">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8243">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8244">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8244">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8245">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8246">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8246">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8247">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8248">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8249">Met de  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8249">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8250">Er wordt een  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8250">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-8251">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8251">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8252">Met de  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8252">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8290">Btw-nummer voor Nederland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8290">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-8291">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8291">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8292">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8292">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8293">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8293">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8294">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8294">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8295">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8295">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8296">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8296">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8297">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8297">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8298">Alfanumeriek patroon van 14 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8298">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8299">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8299">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8300">Alfanumeriek patroon van 14 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8300">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8301">N of n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8301">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8302">L of l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8302">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8303">optionele spatie, punt of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8303">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8304">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8304">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8305">optionele spatie, punt of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8305">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8306">B of b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8306">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8307">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8307">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8308">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8308">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8309">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8309">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8310">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8310">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8311">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8311">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8312">De functie Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8312">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8313">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8313">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8314">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8314">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8315">De functie Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8315">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8324">Nieuw-Zeelands bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8324">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-8325">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8325">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8326">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8326">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8327">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8327">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8328">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8328">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8329">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8329">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8330">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8330">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8331">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8332">14-cijferig tot 16-cijferig patroon met optioneel scheidingsteken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8332">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8333">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8334">14-cijferig tot 16-cijferig patroon met optioneel scheidingsteken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8334">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8335">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8335">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8336">een optioneel afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8336">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8337">drie tot vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8337">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8338">een optioneel afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8338">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8339">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8339">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8340">een optioneel afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8340">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8341">twee tot drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8341">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8342">een afbreekstreester of spatie met opties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8342">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8343">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8343">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8344">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8344">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8345">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8346">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8346">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8347">Met de Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8347">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8348">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8348">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8349">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8349">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8350">Met de Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8350">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8358">Nieuw-Zeelands rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8358">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-8359">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8359">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8360">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8360">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8361">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8361">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8362">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8362">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8363">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8363">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8364">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8364">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8365">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8365">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8366">alfanumeriek patroon van acht tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8366">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8367">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8367">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8368">alfanumeriek patroon van acht tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8368">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8369">twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8369">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8370">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8370">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8371">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8372">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8372">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8373">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8374">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8374">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8375">De functie Func_newzealand_driver_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8375">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8376">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8376">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8377">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8377">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8378">De functie Func_newzealand_driver_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8378">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8445">Nieuw-Zeelandse belastingdienst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8445">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-8446">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8446">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8447">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8447">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8448">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8448">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8449">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8449">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8450">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8450">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8451">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8451">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8452">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8452">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8453">acht of negen cijfers met optionele scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8453">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8454">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8454">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8455">acht of negen cijfers met optionele scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8455">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8456">twee of drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8456">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8457">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8457">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8458">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8458">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8459">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8459">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8460">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8460">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8461">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8462">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8462">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8463">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8464">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8464">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8465">De functie Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8465">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8466">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8466">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8467">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8467">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8468">De functie Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8468">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8470">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8470">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8471">ird no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8471">ird no.</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8477">Nieuw-Zeelands ministerie van gezondheid nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8477">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8478">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8479">drie letters, een spatie (optioneel) en vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8479">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8480">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8480">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8481">drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig), behalve 'I' en 'O'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8481">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8482">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8482">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8483">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8483">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8484">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8485">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8486">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8487">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8488">Met de Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8488">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8489">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_nz_terms gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8489">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8490">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8491">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8492">Met de Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8492">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8493">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8493">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8507">Nieuw-Zeelandse sociale zekerheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8507">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8508">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8508">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8509">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8509">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8510">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8510">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8511">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8511">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8512">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8512">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8513">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8513">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8514">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8515">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8515">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8516">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8517">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8517">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8518">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8518">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8519">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8519">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8520">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8520">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8521">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8521">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8522">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8522">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8523">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8524">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8524">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8525">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8526">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8526">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8527">De functie Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8527">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8528">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8528">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8529">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8530">De functie Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8530">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8531">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8531">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8532">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8532">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8533">sociaal welzijn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8533">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8534">sociaal welzijn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8534">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8535">sociaal welzijn Nee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8535">social welfare No.</span></span>

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8538">Noorwegen-identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8538">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8539">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8540">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8540">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8541">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8542">11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8542">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8543">zes cijfers in de indeling DDMMYY die de geboortedatum zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8543">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8544">individueel getal met drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8544">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8545">twee controlecijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8545">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8546">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8547">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8547">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8548">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8549">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8549">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8550">Met de Func_norway_id_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8550">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8551">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_norway_id_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8551">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8552">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8552">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8553">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8553">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8554">De functie Func_norway_id_numbe inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8554">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8555">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8555">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8560">Id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8560">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8561">Identificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8561">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8562">Persoonnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8562">Personnummer</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8564">Verenigd identificatienummer voor meerdere doeleinden in de Filipijnen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8564">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8565">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8566">12 cijfers gescheiden door afbreekstree streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8566">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8567">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8568">12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8568">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8569">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8569">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8570">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8570">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8571">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8571">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8572">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8572">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8573">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8573">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8574">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8574">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8575">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8575">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8576">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8576">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8577">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8577">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8578">De normale expressie Regex_philippines_unified_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8578">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8579">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_philippines_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8579">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8586">Licentienummer van Polen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8586">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8587">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8588">14 cijfers met twee schuine schuine streep</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8588">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8589">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8590">14 cijfers en twee slashes vooruit:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8590">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8591">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8591">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8592">een slash naar voren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8592">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8593">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8594">een slash naar voren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8594">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8595">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8595">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8596">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8596">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8597">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8597">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8598">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8598">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8599">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8599">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8600">Met de normale  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8600">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8601">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8601">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8725">Polen-identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8725">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8726">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8726">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8727">drie letters en zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8727">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8728">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8728">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8729">drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8729">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8730">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8731">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8731">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8732">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8733">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8734">De functie Func_polish_national_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8734">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8735">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8735">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8736">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8737">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8737">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8741">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8741">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8743">Nazwa i nr dowodu toÅ¼samoÅci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8743">Nazwa i nr dowodu toÅ¼samoÅci</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8744">DowÃ³d ToÅ¼samoÅci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8744">DowÃ³d ToÅ¼samoÅci</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8745">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8745">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-8746">besturingssysteem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8746">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8747">Nationale Polen-id (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8747">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8748">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8749">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8749">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8750">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8750">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8751">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum in de notatie YYMMDD vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8751">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8752">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8752">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8753">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8753">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8754">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8754">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8755">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8755">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8756">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8756">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8757">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8757">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8758">Met de Func_pesel_identification_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8758">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8759">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_pesel_identification_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8759">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8760">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8760">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8761">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8761">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8762">Met de Func_pesel_identification_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8762">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8763">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8763">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8775">Polen paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8775">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-8776">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is opgenomen in het gevoelige informatietype EU-paspoortnummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8776">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-8777">Het is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8777">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8778">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8778">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8779">twee letters en zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8779">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8780">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8780">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8781">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8781">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8782">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8782">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8783">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8783">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8784">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8784">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8785">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8785">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8786">Met de `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8786">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8787">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8787">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8788">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8788">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8789">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8789">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8790">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8790">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8791">Met de `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8791">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8792">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8792">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8793">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8793">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8794">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8795">Met de `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8795">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8796">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8822">Polen REGON-getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8822">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-8823">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8824">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8825">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8826">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8827">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8828">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8829">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8830">9-cijferig of 14-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8830">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8831">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8832">negen cijfers of 14-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8832">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8833">negen cijfers of</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8833">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8834">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8834">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8835">afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8835">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8836">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8836">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8837">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8838">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8838">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8839">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8840">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8840">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8841">De functie Func_polish_regon_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8841">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8842">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_polish_regon_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8842">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8843">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8843">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8844">De functie Func_polish_regon_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8844">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
