## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8861">Btw-nummer polen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8861">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-8862">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8862">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8863">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8863">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8864">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8864">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8865">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8865">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8866">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8866">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8867">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8867">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8868">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8869">11 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8869">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8870">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8871">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8871">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8872">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8873">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8873">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8874">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8875">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8876">Met de  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8876">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8877">Er wordt een  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8877">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8883">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8883">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8884">belasting-id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8884">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8885">geen belastingidentificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8885">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8886">btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8886">tax identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8888">belasting nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8888">tax no</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8907">Portugal burgerkaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8907">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8908">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8908">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8909">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8909">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8910">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8910">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8911">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8911">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8912">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8913">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8913">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8914">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8915">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8915">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8916">De normale expressie Regex_portugal_citizen_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8916">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8917">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_portugal_citizen_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8917">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8937">Portugese nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8937">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8938">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8939">twee patronen: twee letters gevolgd door 5-8 cijfers met speciale tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8939">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8940">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8941">Patroon 1: Twee letters gevolgd door 5/6 met speciale tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8941">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8942">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8942">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8943">Een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8943">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8944">Vijf of zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8944">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8945">Een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8945">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8946">EÃ©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8946">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8947">Patroon 2: Een letter gevolgd door 6/8 cijfers met speciale tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8947">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8948">EÃ©n letter (niet zaakgevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8948">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8949">Een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8949">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8950">Zes of acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8950">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8951">Een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8951">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8952">EÃ©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8952">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8953">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8953">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8954">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8954">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-8955">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8955">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-8956">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8956">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8957">Met de normale  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8957">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-8958">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-8958">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9090">Portugal paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9090">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9091">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9092">Ã©Ã©n letter gevolgd door zes cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9092">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9093">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9094">Ã©Ã©n letter gevolgd door zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9094">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9095">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9095">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9096">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9096">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9097">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9098">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9098">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9099">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9100">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9100">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9101">Met de normale  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9101">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9102">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9102">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9103">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9103">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9104">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9104">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9105">Met de normale  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9105">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9106">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9106">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9139">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9139">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9140">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9140">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9141">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9141">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9142">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9143">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9143">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9144">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9145">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9145">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9146">Met de  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9146">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9147">Er wordt een  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9147">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-9148">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9148">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9149">Met de  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9149">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9174">RoemeniÃ« rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9174">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9175">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9175">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9176">Ã©Ã©n teken gevolgd door acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9176">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9177">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9177">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9178">Ã©Ã©n teken gevolgd door acht cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9178">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9179">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive) of cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9179">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9180">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9180">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9181">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9182">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9182">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9183">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9184">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9184">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9185">Met de normale  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9185">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9186">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9186">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9314">Roemeense persoonlijke numerieke code (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9314">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-9315">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9315">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9316">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9316">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9317">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9317">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9318">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9318">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9319">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9319">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9320">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9320">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9321">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9321">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9322">13 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9322">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9323">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9323">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9324">Ã©Ã©n cijfer van 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9324">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9325">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum (YYMMDD) vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9325">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9326">twee cijfers, die 01-52 of 99 kunnen zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9326">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9327">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9327">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9328">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9329">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9329">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9330">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9331">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9331">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9332">Met de  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9332">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9333">Er wordt een  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9333">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-9334">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9334">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9335">Met de  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9335">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9386">RoemeniÃ« paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9386">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9387">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9388">acht of negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9388">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9389">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9390">acht of negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9390">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9391">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9392">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9392">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9393">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9394">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9394">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9395">Met de normale  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9395">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9396">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9397">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (voorbeeld- 01 FEB/FEB 10) of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9397">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9398">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9399">Met de normale  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9399">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9400">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9400">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9418">Rusland paspoortnummer binnenlands</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9418">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-9419">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9419">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9423">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9423">records management</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9425">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9426">10-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9426">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9427">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9428">10-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9428">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9429">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9429">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9430">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9430">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9431">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9431">two digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9435">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9435">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9436">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9436">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9437">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9437">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9438">In de regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9438">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9439">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9439">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9463">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9463">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9474">In de regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9474">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9475">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9475">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9492">Nationale id van Saudi-ArabiÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9492">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9493">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9494">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9494">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9495">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9496">10 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9496">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9497">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9498">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9498">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9499">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9500">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9501">De normale expressie Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9501">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9502">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9502">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9509">NRIC-nummer (National Registration Identity Card) van Singapore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9509">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9510">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9510">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9511">negen letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9511">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9512">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9512">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9513">negen letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9513">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9514">de letter "F", "G", "S" of "T" (niet zaakgevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9514">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9515">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9515">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9516">een alfabetisch vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9516">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9517">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9518">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9519">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9520">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9521">De normale expressie Regex_singapore_nric inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9521">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9522">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_singapore_nric gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9522">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9523">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9524">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9525">De normale expressie Regex_singapore_nric inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9525">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9526">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9526">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9537">Slowakije-rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9537">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9538">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9539">Ã©Ã©n teken gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9539">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9540">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9541">Ã©Ã©n teken gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9541">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9542">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive) of cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9542">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9543">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9543">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9544">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9545">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9545">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9546">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9547">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9547">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9548">Met de normale  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9548">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9549">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9549">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9675">Persoonlijk nummer slowakije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9675">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-9676">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9676">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9677">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9677">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9678">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9678">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9679">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9679">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9680">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9680">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9681">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9681">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9682">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9683">negen of tien cijfers met optionele backslash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9683">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9684">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9684">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9685">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9685">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9686">optionele slash (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9686">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9687">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9687">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9688">een optioneel vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9688">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9689">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9690">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9690">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9691">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9692">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9692">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9693">Met de  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9693">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9694">Er wordt een  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9694">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-9695">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9695">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9696">Met de  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9696">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9743">Slowakije paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9743">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9744">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9745">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9745">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9746">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9747">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter (niet case-sensitive) gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9747">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9748">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9749">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9749">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9750">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9751">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9752">Met de normale  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9752">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9753">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9753">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9754">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9754">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9755">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9755">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9756">Met de normale  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9756">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9757">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9757">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9779">Nummer van sloveens rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9779">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9780">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9781">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9781">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9782">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9783">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9783">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9784">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9784">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9785">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9785">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9786">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9786">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9787">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9787">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9788">Met de normale  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9788">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9789">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9789">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9916">SloveniÃ« Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9916">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-9917">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9917">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9918">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9918">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9919">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9919">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9920">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9920">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9921">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9921">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9922">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9922">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9923">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9923">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9924">13 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9924">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9925">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9925">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9926">13 cijfers in het opgegeven patroon:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9926">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9927">zeven cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (DDMMLLL) waarbij 'LLL' overeenkomt met de laatste drie cijfers van het geboortejaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9927">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9928">twee cijfers die overeenkomen met het geboortegebied "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9928">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9929">drie cijfers die overeenkomen met een combinatie van geslacht en serienummer voor personen die op dezelfde dag zijn geboren (000-499 voor mannen en 500-999 voor vrouwen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9929">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9930">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9930">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9931">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9932">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9932">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9933">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9934">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9934">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9935">Met de  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9935">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9936">Er wordt een  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9936">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-9937">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9937">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9938">Met de  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9938">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9966">SloveniÃ« paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9966">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9967">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9968">twee letters gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9968">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9969">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9970">twee letters gevolgd door zeven cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9970">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9971">de letter 'P'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9971">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9972">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9972">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9973">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9973">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9974">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9975">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9975">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-9976">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9977">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9977">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9978">Met de normale  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9978">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9979">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9979">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9980">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9980">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-9981">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9982">Met de normale  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9982">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-9983">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-9983">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10006">Nummer van belastingidentificatie van SloveniÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10006">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-10007">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10007">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10008">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10008">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10009">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10009">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10010">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10010">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10011">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10011">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10012">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10012">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10013">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10014">acht cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10014">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10015">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10015">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10016">Ã©Ã©n cijfer van 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10016">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10017">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10017">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10018">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10018">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10019">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10020">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10020">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10021">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10022">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10022">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10023">Met de  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10023">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10024">Er wordt een  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10024">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-10025">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10025">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10026">Met de  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10026">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10050">Zuid-Afrika-identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10050">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10051">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10052">13 cijfers die spaties kunnen bevatten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10052">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10053">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10054">13 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10054">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10055">zes cijfers in de notatie YYMMDD, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10055">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10056">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10056">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10057">een indicator voor een eencijferig burgerschap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10057">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10058">het cijfer '8' of '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10058">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10059">Ã©Ã©n cijfer, een checksum-cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10059">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10060">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10061">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10061">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10062">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10063">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10063">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10064">Met de Func_south_africa_identification_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10064">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10065">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_south_africa_identification_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10065">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10066">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10066">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
