## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10072">Registratienummer voor inwoners van Zuid-Korea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10072">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10073">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10074">13 cijfers met een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10074">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10075">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10076">13 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10076">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10077">zes cijfers in de notatie YYMMDD, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10077">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10078">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10078">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10079">Ã©Ã©n cijfer dat wordt bepaald door de eeuw en het geslacht</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10079">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10080">viercijferige regio-van-geboortecode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10080">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10081">een cijfer dat wordt gebruikt om onderscheid te maken tussen personen voor wie de voorgaande getallen identiek zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10081">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10082">een vinkje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10082">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10083">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10084">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10084">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10085">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10086">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10086">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10087">De functie Func_south_korea_resident_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10087">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10088">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_south_korea_resident_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10088">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10089">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10089">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10090">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10090">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10091">De functie Func_south_korea_resident_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10091">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10092">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10092">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10100">Rijbewijsnummer van Spanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10100">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10101">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10102">acht cijfers gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10102">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10103">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10104">acht cijfers, gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10104">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10105">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10105">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10106">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10106">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10107">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10108">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10108">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10109">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10110">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10111">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10111">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10112">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10113">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10113">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10114">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10114">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10248">Spanje DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10248">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-10249">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10249">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10250">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10250">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10251">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10251">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10252">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10252">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10253">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10253">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10254">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10254">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10255">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10256">acht cijfers gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10256">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10257">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10258">zeven cijfers gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10258">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10259">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10259">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10260">Een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10260">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10261">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10261">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10262">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10263">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10263">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10264">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10265">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10265">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10266">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10266">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10267">Er wordt een  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10267">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10268">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10268">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10269">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10269">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10293">Spanje paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10293">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10294">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10294">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10295">een combinatie van letters en getallen met acht of negen tekens zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10295">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10296">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10296">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10297">een combinatie van letters en cijfers met acht of negen tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10297">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10298">twee cijfers of letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10298">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10299">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10299">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10300">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10300">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10301">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10302">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10302">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10303">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10304">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10305">Met de normale  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10305">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10306">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10306">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10307">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` indeling DD-MM-YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10307">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10308">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10308">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10309">Met de normale  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10309">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10310">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10310">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10311">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10311">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10312">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10312">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10313">paspoort #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10313">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10314">paspoort #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10314">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10315">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10315">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10316">paspoorten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10316">passports</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10339">Spanje sociaal-zekerheidsnummer (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10339">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10340">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10340">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10341">11-12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10341">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10342">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10342">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10343">11-12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10343">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10344">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10344">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10345">a forward slash (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10345">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10346">zeven tot acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10346">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10347">a forward slash (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10347">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10348">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10348">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10349">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10350">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10350">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10351">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10352">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10352">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10353">De functie Func_spanish_social_security_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10353">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10354">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10354">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="43275-10355">Er wordt een  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10355">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10356">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10356">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10357">De functie Func_spanish_social_security_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10357">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10358">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10358">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10367">Btw-nummer van Spanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10367">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-10368">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10368">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10369">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10369">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10370">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10370">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10371">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10371">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10372">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10372">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10373">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10373">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10374">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10375">zeven of acht cijfers en een of twee letters in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10375">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10376">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10376">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10377">Spaanse natuurlijke personen met een Nationale identiteitskaart van Spanje:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10377">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10378">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10378">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10379">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10379">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-10380">Niet-ingezetene Spanjaarden zonder spaanse nationale identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10380">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10381">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter 'L' (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10381">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10382">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10382">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10383">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10383">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-10384">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10384">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10385">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter 'K' (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10385">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10386">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10386">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10387">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10387">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-10388">Buitenlanders met het identificatienummer van een buitenlander</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10388">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10389">een hoofdletter met de naam 'X', 'Y' of 'Z' (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10389">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10390">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10390">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10391">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10391">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-10392">Buitenlanders zonder het identificatienummer van een buitenlander</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10392">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10393">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter met de letter 'M' (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10393">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10394">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10394">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10395">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10395">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10396">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10397">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10397">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10398">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10399">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10400">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10400">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10401">Er wordt een  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10401">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-10402">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10402">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10403">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10403">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10434">SQL Server verbindingsreeks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10434">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10435">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10436">De tekenreeks 'Gebruikers-id', 'Gebruikers-id', 'uid' of 'UserId' gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10436">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10437">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10437">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10438">de tekenreeks 'Gebruikers-id', 'Gebruikers-id', 'uid' of 'UserId'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10438">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10439">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10439">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10440">de tekenreeks 'Wachtwoord' of 'pwd' waarbij 'pwd' niet wordt voorafgegaan door een kleine letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10440">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10441">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10441">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10442">een teken dat geen dollarteken ($), procentsymbool (%), groter dan symbool (>), bij symbool (@), aanhalingsteken ("), puntkomma (;), linkerbrace([) of linker vierkante haak ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10442">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10443">een combinatie van 7-128 tekens die geen puntkomma zijn (;), slash (/) of aanhalingsteken (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10443">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10444">een puntkomma (;) of aanhalingsteken (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10444">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10445">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10446">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10446">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10447">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10448">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10448">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10449">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10449">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10450">Een trefwoord CEP_GlobalFilter wordt niet gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10450">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10451">De normale expressie CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon, wordt niet gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10451">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10452">In de CEP_CommonExampleKeywords wordt geen inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10452">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10460">(Houd er rekening mee dat deze trefwoorden technisch gezien met dit type gevoelige informatie worden geÃ¯dentificeerd met behulp van een gewone expressie, niet met een trefwoordlijst.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10460">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10461">Wachtwoord of pwd gevolgd door 0-2 spaties, een gelijkteken (=), 0-2 spaties en een sterretje (\*) -OF-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10461">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10462">Wachtwoord of pwd gevolgd door:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10462">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-10463">Gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10463">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-10464">Minder dan symbool (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10464">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-10465">Een combinatie van 1-200 tekens die hoofdletters of kleine letters, cijfers, een sterretje (\*), afbreekstreeping (-), onderstreping (_) of witruimteteken zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10465">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-10466">Groter dan symbool (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10466">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10480">Rijbewijsnummer van Zweden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10480">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10481">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10482">tien cijfers met een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10482">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10483">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10484">tien cijfers met een afbreekstreester:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10484">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10485">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10485">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10486">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10486">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10487">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10487">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10488">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10489">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10489">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10490">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10491">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10492">Met de normale  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10492">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10493">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10493">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10626">Zweedse nationale id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10626">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10627">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10627">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10628">10 of 12 cijfers en een optioneel scheidingsteken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10628">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10629">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10629">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10630">10 of 12 cijfers en een optioneel scheidingsteken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10630">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10631">twee cijfers (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10631">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10632">Zes cijfers in datumnotatie YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10632">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10633">scheidingsteken van "-" of "+" (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10633">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10634">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10634">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10635">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10636">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10636">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10637">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10638">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10638">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10639">Met de `Func_swedish_national_identifier` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10639">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10640">Er wordt een `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` trefwoord uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10640">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10641">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10641">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10642">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10642">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10643">Met de `Func_swedish_national_identifier` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10643">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10644">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10644">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10663">Zweden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10663">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10664">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10665">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10665">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10666">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10667">acht opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10667">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10668">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10669">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10669">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10670">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10671">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10671">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10672">met de normale expressie Regex_sweden_passport_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10672">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10673">een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_sweden_passport` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10673">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10674">met de normale expressie wordt een datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10674">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10675">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10676">met de normale expressie Regex_sweden_passport_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10676">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10677">een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_sweden_passport` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10677">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10713">Btw-nummer zweden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10713">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-10714">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10714">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10715">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10715">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10716">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10716">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10717">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10717">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10718">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10718">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10719">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10719">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10720">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10721">10 cijfers en een symbool in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10721">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10722">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10723">10 cijfers en een symbool:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10723">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10724">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10724">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10725">een plusteken of minteken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10725">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10726">drie cijfers die het identificatienummer uniek maken op de volgende plaatsen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10726">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="43275-10727">voor getallen die vÃ³Ã³r 1990 zijn uitgegeven, wordt met het zevende en achtste cijfer het geboorteland of de in het buitenland geboren personen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10727">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="43275-10728">het cijfer in de negende positie geeft geslacht aan door oneven voor mannelijke of zelfs voor vrouwelijke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10728">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10729">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10729">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10730">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10731">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10731">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10732">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10733">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10733">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10734">Met de  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10734">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10735">Er wordt een  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10735">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="43275-10736">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10736">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10737">Met de  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10737">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10763">SWIFT-code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10763">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10764">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10765">vier letters gevolgd door 5-31 letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10765">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10766">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10767">vier letters gevolgd door 5-31 letters of cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10767">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10768">bankcode met vier letters (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10768">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10769">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10769">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10770">4-28 letters of cijfers (het basisrekeningnummer (BBAN))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10770">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10771">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10771">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10772">Ã©Ã©n tot drie letters of cijfers (rest van de BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10772">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10773">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10774">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10774">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10775">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10776">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10776">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10777">De normale expressie Regex_swift inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10777">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10778">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_swift gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10778">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10779">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10779">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_swift"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10780">Keyword_swift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10780">Keyword_swift</span></span>

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10815">Zwitserland SSN AHV-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10815">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-10816">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10816">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10817">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10817">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10818">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10818">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10819">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10819">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10820">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10820">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10821">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10821">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10822">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10822">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10823">13-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10823">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10824">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10824">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10825">13-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10825">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10826">drie cijfers - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10826">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10827">een optionele punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10827">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10828">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10828">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10829">een optionele punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10829">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10830">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10830">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10831">een optionele punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10831">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10832">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10832">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10833">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10833">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10834">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10834">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10835">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10835">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10836">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10836">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10837">Met de Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10837">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10838">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10838">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10839">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10839">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10840">Met de Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10840">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10861">Taiwan national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10861">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10862">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10863">Ã©Ã©n letter (in het Engels) gevolgd door negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10863">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10864">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10865">een letter (in het Engels) gevolgd door negen cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10865">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10866">Ã©Ã©n letter (in het Engels, niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10866">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10867">het cijfer '1' of '2'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10867">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10868">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10868">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10869">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10869">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10870">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10870">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10871">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10871">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10872">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10872">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10873">Met de Func_taiwanese_national_id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10873">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10874">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_taiwanese_national_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10874">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10875">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10875">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10876">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10876">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10877">Met de Func_taiwanese_national_id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10877">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10878">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10878">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10895">Taiwan paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10895">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10896">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10896">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10897">biometrisch paspoortnummer: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10897">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10898">niet-biometrisch paspoortnummer: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10898">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10899">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10899">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-10900">biometrisch paspoortnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10900">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10901">het teken '3'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10901">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10902">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10902">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10903">niet-biometrisch paspoortnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10903">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10904">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10904">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10905">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10906">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10906">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10907">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10908">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10908">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10909">De normale expressie Regex_taiwan_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10909">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10910">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_taiwan_passport gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10910">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10921">Taiwan-ingezeten certificaatnummer (ARC/TARC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10921">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10922">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10923">10 letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10923">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10924">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10925">10 letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10925">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10926">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10926">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10927">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10927">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10928">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10928">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10929">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10929">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10930">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10930">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10931">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10931">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10932">De normale expressie Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10932">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10933">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10933">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
