## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10947">Thaise bevolkingsidentificatiecode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10947">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10948">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10949">13 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10949">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10950">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10951">13 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10951">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10952">eerste cijfer is geen nul of negen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10952">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10953">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10953">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10954">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10955">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10955">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10956">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10957">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10957">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10958">Met de Func_Thai_Citizen_Id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10958">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10959">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10959">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10960">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10960">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10961">Met de Func_Thai_Citizen_Id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10961">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10970">Turks nationaal identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10970">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10971">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10972">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10972">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10973">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10974">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10974">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10975">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10976">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10976">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10977">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10978">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10978">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10979">De functie Func_Turkish_National_Id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10979">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10980">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Turkish_National_Id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10980">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10981">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10982">De functie Func_Turkish_National_Id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10982">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10989">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10989">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-10990">rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10990">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10991">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10991">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10992">Combinatie van 18 letters en cijfers in de opgegeven notatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10992">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-10993">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10993">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-10994">18 letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10994">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10995">Vijf letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) of het cijfer '9' in plaats van een letter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10995">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10996">EÃ©n cijfer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10996">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10997">Vijf cijfers in de datumnotatie MMDDY voor geboortedatum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10997">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-10998">Het zevende teken wordt verhoogd met 50 als het stuurprogramma een vrouw is. voor examen, 51 tot 62 in plaats van 01 tot 12.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10998">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-10999">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) of het cijfer '9' in plaats van een letter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-10999">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11000">Vijf cijfers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11000">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11001">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11002">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11002">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11003">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11004">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11005">Met de `Func_uk_drivers_license` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11005">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11006">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11006">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11007">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11007">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11008">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11008">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11009">Met de `Func_uk_drivers_license` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11009">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11010">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11010">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11131">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11131">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-11132">kieslijstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11132">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11133">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11133">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11134">twee letters gevolgd door 1-4 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11134">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11135">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11135">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11136">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door 1-4 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11136">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11137">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11138">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11139">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11140">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11140">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11141">De normale expressie Regex_uk_electoral inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11141">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11142">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_electoral gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11142">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11144">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11144">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11145">raadsnominatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11145">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11146">formulier voor voordracht</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11146">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11147">kiesregister</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11147">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11148">kieslijst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11148">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11149">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11149">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-11150">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11150">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11151">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11152">10-17 cijfers gescheiden door spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11152">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11153">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11154">10-17 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11154">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11155">3 of 10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11155">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11156">een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11156">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11157">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11157">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11158">een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11158">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11159">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11159">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11160">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11161">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11161">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11162">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11163">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11163">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11164">De functie Func_uk_nhs_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11164">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11165">Een van de volgende gegevens is waar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11165">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-11166">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nhs_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11166">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-11167">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11167">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="43275-11168">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11168">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11169">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11182">HUISARTS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11182">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11183">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11183">DOB</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11187">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11187">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-11188">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11188">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-11189">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie maakt deel uit van het eu-nationale identificatienummer voor gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11189">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-11190">Het is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11190">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11191">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11192">zeven tekens of negen tekens gescheiden door spaties of streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11192">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11193">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11194">twee mogelijke patronen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11194">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11195">twee letters (geldige NINOs gebruiken alleen bepaalde tekens in dit voorvoegsel, dat door dit patroon wordt gevalideerd; niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11195">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11196">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11196">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11197">'A', 'B', 'C' of 'D' (net als het voorvoegsel zijn alleen bepaalde tekens toegestaan in het achtervoegsel; niet hoofd- en hoofdschruf)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11197">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11198">OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11198">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11199">twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11199">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11200">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11200">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11201">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11201">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11202">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11202">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11203">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11203">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11204">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11204">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11205">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11205">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11206">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11206">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11207">'A', 'B', 'C' of 'D'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11207">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11208">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11208">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11209">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11209">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11210">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11210">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11211">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11211">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11212">De functie Func_uk_nino inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11212">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11213">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nino gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11213">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11214">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11214">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11215">De functie Func_uk_nino inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11215">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11237">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11237">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-11238">Uniek referentienummer voor belastingbetalers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11238">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-11239">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11239">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11240">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11240">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11241">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11241">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11242">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11242">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11243">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11243">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11244">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11244">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11245">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11246">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11246">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11247">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11248">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11248">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11249">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11249">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11250">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11250">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11251">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11251">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11252">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11252">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11253">Met de  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11253">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11254">Er wordt een  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11254">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11274">Amerikaans bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11274">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11275">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11276">6-17 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11276">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11277">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11278">6-17 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11278">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11279">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11280">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11280">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11281">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11282">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11282">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11283">De normale expressie Regex_usa_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11283">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11284">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_usa_Bank_Account gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11284">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11314">Amerikaans nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11314">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11315">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11315">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11316">Is afhankelijk van de status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11316">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11317">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11317">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11318">is afhankelijk van de staat, bijvoorbeeld New York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11318">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11319">negen cijfers die zijn opgemaakt, zoals ddd ddd ddd, komen overeen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11319">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11320">negen cijfers zoals ddddddddd komen niet overeen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11320">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11321">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11321">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11322">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11322">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11323">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11323">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11324">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11324">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11325">De functie Func_new_york_drivers_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11325">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11326">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11326">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11327">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_us_drivers_license gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11327">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11328">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11328">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11329">De functie Func_new_york_drivers_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11329">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11330">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11330">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11331">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11331">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11332">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_us_drivers_license gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11332">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11430">Amerikaans individueel nummer voor het identificeren van belastingbetalers (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11430">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11431">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11432">negen cijfers die beginnen met een '9' en een '7' of '8' bevatten als het vierde cijfer, eventueel opgemaakt met spaties of streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11432">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11433">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11434">opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11434">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11435">het cijfer '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11435">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11436">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11436">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11437">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11437">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11438">een '7' of '8'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11438">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11439">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11439">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11440">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11440">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11441">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11441">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11442">niet-opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11442">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11443">het cijfer '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11443">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11444">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11444">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11445">een '7' of '8'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11445">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11446">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11446">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11447">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11448">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11448">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11449">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11450">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11450">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11451">Met de Func_formatted_itin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11451">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11452">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_itin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11452">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11453">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11453">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11454">Met de Func_unformatted_itin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11454">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11455">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_itin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11455">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11456">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11456">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11457">Met de functie Func_formatted_itin of Func_unformatted_itin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11457">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11458">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11458">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11472">Amerikaans sociaal-zekerheidsnummer (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11472">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11473">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11474">negen cijfers, die zich mogelijk in een opgemaakt of niet-opgemaakt patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11474">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="43275-11475">Als een SSN vÃ³Ã³r medio 2011 is uitgegeven, heeft een SSN een sterke opmaak waarbij bepaalde delen van het getal binnen bepaalde bereik moeten vallen om geldig te zijn (maar er is geen checksum).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11475">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11476">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11476">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11477">Vier functies zoeken naar SSN's in vier verschillende patronen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11477">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11478">Func_ssn vindt SSN's met een sterke opmaak van vÃ³Ã³r 2011 die zijn opgemaakt met streepjes of spaties (ddd-ddddd OR ddd ddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11478">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn vindt SSN's met een sterke opmaak van vÃ³Ã³r 2011 die niet is opgemaakt als negen opeenvolgende cijfers (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn zoekt naar SSN's na 2011 die zijn opgemaakt met streepjes of spaties (ddd-dd-dddd OF ddd dd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn wordt na 2011 SSN's gevonden die niet zijn opgemaakt als negen opeenvolgende cijfers (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11482">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11483">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11483">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11484">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11484">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11485">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11485">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11486">De functie Func_ssn inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11486">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11487">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11487">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11488">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11488">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11489">Met de Func_unformatted_ssn wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11489">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11490">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11490">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11491">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11491">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11492">Met de Func_randomized_formatted_ssn wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11492">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11493">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11493">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11494">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11494">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11495">De functie Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11495">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11496">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11496">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11511">V.S. / VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11511">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="43275-11512">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11512">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11513">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11514">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11514">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11515">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11516">negen opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11516">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11517">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11518">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11518">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11519">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11520">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11521">De functie Func_usa_uk_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11521">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11522">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11522">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11523">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trefwoord uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11523">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11524">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11525">De functie Func_usa_uk_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11525">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11526">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11526">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11543">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11543">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11544">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11544">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11545">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11545">communication compliance policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11549">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11550">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11550">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11551">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11552">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11552">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11553">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11553">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11554">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11554">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11555">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11555">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11556">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11556">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11557">In de regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11557">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11567">Oekraine paspoort internationaal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11567">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="43275-11568">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11568">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11569">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11569">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11570">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11570">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11571">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11571">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11572">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11572">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11573">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11573">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11574">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11574">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11575">alfanumeriek patroon met acht tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11575">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11576">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11576">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11577">alfanumeriek patroon met acht tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11577">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11578">twee letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11578">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11579">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11579">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11580">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11580">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11581">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11581">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11582">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11582">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43275-11583">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11583">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11584">In de regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11584">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11585">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11585">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11586">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11586">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="43275-11587">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11587">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="43275-11588">OekraÃ¯ne-paspoort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43275-11588">ukraine passport</span></span>
